story:
Our Story

My name is Jonathan Philippe. I am the founder of Sante Haiti. As someone who grew up in Haiti, I experienced first-hand what it means to not have access to basic health care. Thank goodness, I never had any major illness. However, this is not the case for a good portion of the population. Knowing that fact has put a strong desire in my heart to go back to Haiti and help as best as I can. Since starting medical school, I have been going to Haiti with friends at least once a year to provide basic healthcare in the community where I grew up, Martissant, a suburb of Port-au-Prince.

 

Sante Pou Tout Moun "Health Care for All" is the very essence of Sante Haiti. It is the guiding principle of our work. We see health as a human right that should be enjoyed by all and it is our mission to do all we can to ensure that the men, women and children of Haiti are able to enjoy this right. We provide sante pou tout moun through service, partnership, education and empowerment.

Our vision is to lessen existing healthcare inequalities by improving access to essential medical services within communities. We aim to highlight the importance of primary prevention through promoting healthy lifestyles and supporting community members in reaching and maintaining their health-related goals.
We are committed to working in partnership with members of the community and with supporting agencies to reach these objectives.

It is our belief that education leads to empowerment and as public health physicians we are strongly dedicated to teaching. We lead several community talks on public health issues and have seen, first hand, the value of teaching/training in empowering individuals and communities. A major component of our work also involves training health workers, nurses in particular, for the continuity of care.


The Impact

The program was initiated in the summer of 2008 where in less than 3 days, over 400 patients were seen for blood pressure checks, distribution of vitamins and education on public health issues in Martissant. The following year, over 1,000 patients were seen in Martissant, Delmas, Aux Cayes, Cap Haitien by our group. We have nurses that follow-up with those patients bi-weekly. The people we see are always looking forward to our return to Haiti.  They constantly ask us to come more often so they can get a chance to see a healthcare professional more than once a year without having to worry about cost. In this spirit, we are planning on continuing and expanding the project, traveling to Haiti at least once a year for about 3 weeks to better our project and work in collaboration with local physicians to establish continuity of care.
In the communities where we work, we always find people who have never been to doctors, not because they do not want to, but because they can't afford the costs associated with it. A good portion of the people we have seen unknowingly have severe hypertension. Anemia is also very prevalent in adults and children. Easily treatable infections such as urinary tract infections, vaginal candidiasis or pneumonia are major problems because they are not properly treated or not treated at all. Usually people self-medicate on antibiotics (which are usually expired or have been sitting in the sun) that are easily available on the streets without need for prescriptions. Because of limited access to the healthcare, a good portion of the population has a short life expectancy. We believe that educating a community about important aspects of their health and providing them with the tools to implement successful changes, will not only improve the health of the community, but ultimately contribute to the prosperity of the nation as a whole.

 


What We Need 

We will be heading to Haiti in May 2012. Our goal is to raise $15, 000 to provide medicines, supplies, sponsor local health workers and sponsor continued care for severely ill patients.  

 

Medicines

Since high blood pressure and anemia are the most prevalent conditions that we have seen so far, we are planning on bringing blood pressure medications, iron tablets, folate, and other vitamins. Ibuprofen and antibiotics will also be very valuable to the community. We estimate that we will need about $5000 to cover those expenses.

 

Supplies

We need various supplies for screenings and follow-up checks such as glucometers and test strips, blood pressure cuffs, cholesterol meters and test strips, gloves, alcohol swabs, lancets, neosporin, bandages, etc. We estimate we will need about $3000 to cover those expenses.

 

Stipends for community workers

We have many people who live in Haiti that will help us with translation, registration on the clinic days, doing the vitals and other supporting work. We plan to give those helpers about $3000 total for their assistance.

 

Miscellaneous

While all the healthcare professionals who will be going to Haiti with us will be volunteering their time and paying their own airfare, certain expenses associated with the trip will be covered by the money raised. Expenses  associated with the transportation of supplies (customs etc.), printing brochures and other educational material,  transportation to and from locations within Haiti to provide care and food throughout our trip. We estimate for 5 volunteers for 3 weeks, we will need about $1000 for those expenses. 

 

Community Health Fund

In 2012 we will be launching our Community Health Fund. Medical fees, though only less than $40 per patient, are a major barrier to care for many Haitians. We are aiming to combat this by creating a fund to meet the medical costs of those in need of continued care.The money will be used to sponsor clinic visits, medicine costs and hospital stays of patients in need of continued care. From the money raised, $3000 will be put into the Community Health Fund. We plan to continue raising money, particularly for the fund in the future.
 

Your contribution would be a big help in ensuring a sick individual gets the care s/he needs.


 

Other Ways You Can Help

Like us on Facebook.

Visit our website.

Volunteer with us.

story:
You Did It!

Thanks to all the contributors joining the effort to commission a bronze, memorial plaque etched with Bob’s image, his bullet-in-flight signature, along with a brief history of his amazing shooting career.

Watermarked sample of poster. Design by Enrico Spadoni

Under a beautiful Montana sky Sunday, June 16th at the Butte Gun Club range near Butte, Montana, Becky, family, friends, former fast-draw students, fans and industry representatives celebrated Bob's life with an organized, 70-shot, Six-Gun Salute. It was followed by a line of over two dozen of the participants emptying their single-action revolvers at steel targets set up 50 yards away.  Few shooters hit the targets even though Bob always made distance shots look so easy! The event was open to the public so people could witness and hear, with ear protection of course, the salute to Bob Munden, Fastest Man with a Gun Who Ever Lived. It was a great day!Becky Munden lost her one true love when Bob passed away December 10, 2012, but he always said she was stronger than she looked and so far, she has not let him down, and, Becky fired the first shot of the 70-shot Six-Gun Salute!

Bob Munden (1942-2012) loved entertaining and teaching you. He loved thinking up new ways to astonish you. He loved to interest you in different kinds of shooting and make you laugh during live exhibitions or on "Shooting USA's Impossible Shots" on Outdoor Channel using handguns, rifles and shotguns — and he would love that you helped make his memorial possible.

Though well-made bronze memorials don’t come cheap, we would very much like to see the Bob Munden project come to be -- and it can with your help!

Many Thanks
and

“May Your Life Be Full of Bull’s-Eyes”

It was followed by a line of over two dozen of the participants emptying their single-action revolvers at steel targets set up 50 yards away.  Few shooters hit the targets even though Bob always made distance shots look so easy! The event was open to the public so people could witness and hear, with ear protection of course, the salute to Bob Munden, Fastest Man with a Gun Who Ever Lived. It was a great day!Becky Munden lost her one true love when Bob passed away December 10, 2012, but he always said she was stronger than she looked and so far, she has not let him down, and, Becky fired the first shot of the 70-shot Six-Gun Salute!
Bob Munden (1942-2012) loved entertaining and teaching you. He loved thinking up new ways to astonish you. He loved to interest you in different kinds of shooting and make you laugh during live exhibitions or on "Shooting USA's Impossible Shots" on Outdoor Channel using handguns, rifles and shotguns — and he would love that you helped make his memorial possible.
Though well-made bronze memorials don’t come cheap, we would very much like to see the Bob Munden project come to be -- and it can with your help!

Many Thanksand

“May Your Life Be Full of Bull’s-Eyes”

story:
I usually would not bother just anyone with personal matters, but this one is close to my heart (and a lot of other people)


     I am asking if from the bottom of your hearts, you could help myself and my family out. You see, my mother
in law (Cloudkicker and Whoof’s mother) has Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (or COPD), it is a type of lung disease that causes scarring and other damage to the lungs and makes it extremely hard to breathe. I wish so badly I could say this is the only issue she has, but she also has had both of her knees replaced, and fibromyalgia. Both of which cause her a lot of physical pain and require a lot of medical care.

She is my personal hero, and she does as much as she can with the tragedy that has befallen her. Even with these issues, she encouraged Cloudkicker and myself to pursue our want to run this server, and supports it (Even as one of our first donators) She is encouraged with the love and joy you all give us.


     So now you say “What can I do?”

 

     They have no insurance, and she is on oxygen 24 hours a day to be able to really think straight or do simple tasks like get dressed or search for something. She has an oxygen machine, but she is not able to leave
her room. This is ok for a little while, but in order to go to do anything, she has to be without oxygen which makes it even worse. To make some food, to go to bathroom or out into town with us. A portable oxygen
machine would make life so much better for all of us. When she had her knees replaced, she got the knee surgery so she could go out and do things with us, and have a better life. Though now that she is bedridden
basically, it makes it seem like it wasn’t a good idea for her, and I know it would mean a lot to her to be able to do things again, even if just for a few hours at a time


     The problem is, these machines cost around 3000 dollars without insurance, and I’d like to turn to you all to
please help us. We would be eternally grateful and I know this will help her a few times over. If we go over this, the costs will go towards a better machine, or medication. I assure you EVERY CENT will go towards helping her. I appreciate you taking the time to read this, and please pass this to people you know.

story:
Who we are

We are a group of Rwandans who are in US colleges under the name "Rwandans4Water' trying to help our people in Rwanda have access to clean drinking water. Our motto is 'Bringing Water Home' and we are proud to be a solution we once struggled with. We have 2 full-time volunteers who returned home after they graduated from Oklahoma Christian School of Engineering. They are coordinating all activities.

What we are doing

in Partnership with water4 Foundation, we are developing an affordable and sustainable technology that is helping people in rural areas get clean water. they technology consist of different metal tools that manually drill a water-well without the usage of sophisticated and expensive machinery. Shipping all the materials is expensive and that is the reason why we are trying to locally manufacture the materials. An amount of  $15,000 is enough to set up a small manufacturing shop that will heavily contribute in designing drilling equippments, thus increasing our impact in rural communities.

The Impact

In partnership with local administration and Rwanda ministry of infrascture, we have from 2010 completed 9 water wells in the Eastern Province of Rwanda, Gatsibo District. Up to 5,000 people now have access to fresh water. With the materials being manufactured in Rwanda and distributed to teams of trained locals we are expecting to provide water to 20,000 people within the next 2 years. Join us and help people have this very basic need in life: WATER!

 

How to help

Donate and help us reach $15,000 in the next 2 months. Get the word out to your family, friends, coworkers, etc. Introduce us to people or organizations you know they can help. A full detailed report will be emailed regularly to our donors as the shop gets put in place. We also send a monthly newsletter of our activities in Rwanda.

story:
Quick Intro

Imagine your world without the hassle of passwords...
Never forgetting a password again...
Knowing you digital identities are finally safe...

Hi. We’re MagicKey, perfect password mangement. We are Gyle Iverson and Tim Cope and we love creating new solutions to old problems. For 25 years we have written software to solve problems in many areas, including password management for governments, schools and large organizations. We have developed the world’s only smartphone based password management app. It works like magic, learning, creating, entering, maintaining, and changing your passwords on the one device you aways have with you – your smartphone. Our project is to complete the Beta version that we have developed so far and release this amazing app to the world by March 2013. MagicKey can provide unprecedented security at everyone’s fingertips. But we need your help.

We need to raise $250,000 to cover the cost of development and testing this amazing app or it may never make it out of our lab. So we're turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, we're offering you lifetime subscriptions and the opportunity to be memorialized in the app itself. Your contribution will help us get the product into everyone’s hands, and further, it will help make our digital world a safer place for everyone. Thanks!

Background

Thanks for visiting our MagicKey project today. Again, we are Gyle Iverson and Tim Cope. We are passionate about creating new solutions for old problems. While colleagues at various companies, we have collaborated in the development of; software development tools, post-relational database engines, big data indexing, and most recently, security automation products.

Security automation does not sound sexy does it?

Basically, what we developed were products to help companies follow recommended security best practices. Organizations using our products were able to keep their computers secure without needing a small army of people. Sounds simple right?

Well, automation that makes it look simple is complicated on the inside. And it is developing that balance between apparent simplicity and underlying complexity that we enjoy.

Our history is helping make people’s lives easier though automation, so we looked at a variety of personal productivity areas. The one area we quickly focused on is password management.

Again, we know, this is not sexy, right?
Please keep reading. You will like the ending. We promise.

At our previous employer we worked together developing password management automation for government, schools and large institutions. Password management at that level is different from what you need or want in your life. However, much of what we learned and developed there is applicable for the everyday hassles people have with passwords.

Love 'em or hate 'em, managing passwords takes practice and discipline to achieve and maintain their goal; your security. Unfortunately, most people use their same password everywhere and are surprised when something regrettable happens like their accounts get hacked. The majority of people we talk with say they don’t want to bother with using passwords correctly; the vast majority.

Why We Care

We watched our friends, family, and co-workers struggle with managing their passwords. Heck, we even struggled and we worked in the password management field.

Ironic, right?

We researched the dozens of password managers on Google Play and the Apple App Store. We found a variety of password manager apps. Unfortunately there is no standard describing what a password manager should do. So many of the apps simply let you enter and read your passwords on your smartphone. No automation there. Boring! However, a few apps do offer some degree of automation so we dug into those products to understand their technologies and fundamental design to see if there was room for improvement.

After a closer inspection we found the products providing automation are really PC or Mac products that later added a smartphone version. It appears that so far, these smartphone versions provide limited or no automation at all; instead, the automation resides on a PC or Mac. That seemed odd to us given that today’s smartphone are powerful computers. Then we found the really weird thing. All of the products will copy your user names and passwords to all of the computers and devices you use.

Hold on! Wait a minute!

Putting copies of your secrets on computers and devices which may not be under your control is unsafe! Why is that unsafe? If someone else can control your computer, it is no longer your computer. Therefore your information may become their information. Your home computer could be a great example. Perhaps your significant other, child, or a guest uses your home computer when you are not around. Do you really want to leave your secrets there?

Gyle’s kids are malware magnets and his home computer frequently gets this or that little surprise. Even with anti-virus installed, active, and up to date.

And here’s the deal with what you call your work computer. It is really your employer’s computer and they control it. Their IT people can get in to it and do what they want, whether you are around or not. Again, not a place you want to leave your secrets.

And we also found numerous complaints in product support forums about synchronization problems after passwords are changed. Some products require you to synchronize manually, which takes effort, while other products try to automate synchronization, but network connectivity problems can leave some computers or devices with out of date passwords, leading to manual password resets. This does not sound like quality automation to us.

So we developed a real smartphone password manager app called MagicKey that:

  1. Connects your smartphone to your PC via USB, Bluetooth or Wi-Fi
  2. Automatically learns your existing user names and passwords
  3. Securely stores all of your passwords on your smartphone
  4. Automatically types in your user name and password the next time you visit a site
  5. Keeps your information secure with a single master password
  6. Automatically backs up your secret information
  7. Protects your secrets if your smartphone is lost or stolen
  8. Protects you from forgetting your master password with SpareKeys
  9. Provides a Freemium version for occasional users
  10. Allows secure sharing of user names and passwords with your friends, family and colleagues
  11. Automatically changes your passwords periodically for maximum protection, including the passwords you share

Our beta version of MagicKey for Android currently includes items 1 through 8 now. Our project completes the last few items and we are looking to you for assistance.

What This Means to Us

We want the digital world to be a safer place for you and everyone else. The MagicKey approach is safer than the other products available. And with your help, we will get MagicKey out to everyone.

Your contribution help gets us to our goal of $250,000 and enables us to hire additional people to complete the project by March of 2013; just a few months from now.

We started designing and developing MagicKey in the Spring of 2011 and have a beta version now. People pledging their support that are comfortable working with pre-release software and the occasional problems that may arise are welcome to request a download code. Otherwise, the formal release of MagicKey for Android currently estimated for March 2013.

What’s left to do? Quite a bit. We want to hire some employees and contractors to quickly get MagicKey for Android out for people to use. To do that by March 2013 we need at least $250,000 and here is how we plan to spend that money.

  • We want MagicKey to automatically change your passwords for you on a schedule. Relieving you from the tedious task that you seldom perform anyway, unless you happened to forget your password. Considering there are over 675 million web sites on the Internet today and growing, imagine being content, knowing you are continuously protected from hackers trying to get your passwords from weakly protected web sites. We will spend $35,000 to develop the programming to change a password automatically.
  • We want to add the ability to share user names and passwords with friends, family and collegues. There are many web sites where you only get a single user name and password to access your account information. Trying to routinely change passwords that are shared between multiple people can be a nightmare. The more widely a password is shared, the more frequently it should be changed. The MagicKey sharing modes allow changing shared passwords without the typical synchronization drama found elsewhere. We will spend $40,000 to finish development of the sharing modes. 
  • To activate, upgrade, and issue rewards, we need to develop a web service on the Google App Engine. We have the design and will spend $30,000 to develop this service.
  • We want MagicKey to support additional browsers, such as, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox on Microsoft Windows. Plus, we need to provide our own MagicKey enabled web browser on Google Android. For that we need a small web browser team. We will spend $20,000 on developing the web browser and add-ons.
  • We want MagicKey to work on Apple OS X so the MagicKey communication components need to be ported.  We will spend $25,000 for porting the communication components.
  • After porting the MagicKey communication components to Apple OS X, we then want MagicKey to support Apple Safari, Google Chrome, and Mozilla Firefox on Apple OS X. We will spend $20,000 on these web browser add-ons.
  • We want MagicKey users to have the confidence to set MagicKey to accept automatic updates. To ensure MagicKey’s quality is maintained and improves as we introduce more features, we must create a robust test suite. We will setup two different test teams. One team is dedicated to the Google Android and the other team is dedicated to the Microsoft Windows and Apple OS X components. We will spend $55,000 to develop test suites.

A lot people we meet are asking us to make an Apple iPhone version of MagicKey also. We would love to do that. The funding goal we set for this project lets us complete the MagicKey for Android version and make it available to the world. Every thing over our goal gets us closer to making the MagicKey for iPhone a reality too.

The MagicKey Swag

We have a few swag for you to consider. You can support our campaign by purchasing just the swag or include some swag along with a higher commitment that includes a life-time subscription to MagicKey. Because our swag are made specifically for you, we can print your participation level below the MagicKey logo on all these items. This option is available for the Supporter, Founder, Benefactor, Associate Producer, Producer, Executive Producer, and Key Maker contributions.

Our unique MagicKey mouse pads are available for $10 with domestic shipping included. For international shipping, please add $15.

We also have high-quality 100% cotton t-shirts in standard or fitted style in all popular sizes that are unique for this project. The price to you for our t-shirts is $25 with domestic shipping included. For international shipping, please add $15.

What Happens If We Don’t Meet the Funding Goal?

Because this is a flexible funding project, if we fail to reach the funding goal in time, the delivery date for the MagicKey for Android formal release will be pushed out later in 2013. Should this happen, shortly after the project close date arrives, we will provide everyone with a revised projected delivery date.

Why This Matters to Everyone

You probably hear or read about how hackers routinely break into web sites and steal user names and passwords. And it is scary to imagine this happens more than we hear about because some web sites may not detect the break-in occurred. And worse, maybe there isn’t a break-in at all, and instead, a web site insider with necessary access steals the information and sells it. The best defense against these events affecting you is to have unique complex passwords you change frequently.

Yeah, right. Like that’s going to happen by itself. I mean, really!

What you and everyone else needs is MagicKey. MagicKey lets you take proper password management off your to-do list. Delegate the mundane, time consuming, error-prone task to MagicKey. Just remember your master password and then rest assured MagicKey is keeping the passwords for your digital life safe and secure.

We have made phenomenal strides and now need your help to push MagicKey over the finish line and get it out for the world to use.

All the Ways You Can Help

Become a founding customer by pledging your support. We have a life-time subscription option, plus some personal distinction options which include being memorialized on our website for all to see and even being memorialized in the app. And, a select few can help us create some of the Reward Keys.

  • Include some of our perks with your pledge to show your support to your friends
  • Use the beta version of MagicKey on your Google Android and tell us your success and any problems you find. If you use PayPal for your contribution you can get access to the beta version within a few days. Unfortunately, using your debit or credit card for your contribution postpones access to the beta version until after the project closes.
  • Donate smartphones and tablets to us
    • This helps our testers and developers find and fix weird behavior on various devices before others find the problem
    • It also allows us to certify MagicKey works on all donated devices 
    • We are keen to have devices from all continents 
    • Your device donations will be memorialized on our website for all to see 
    • Our web site lists the current devices MagicKey is using and more information about donating a device
  • Participate in translating MagicKey into additional languages 
    • The mobile app is setup on crowdin.net at translate.cloudvaults.com
    • The connectivity components will be added soon
    • The web site will come later
  • Help spread the word about our project
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • Let your friends know you think MagicKey is cool, exciting, useful, etc. 
    • Use the IndieGoGo share tools too

Closing

Thanks for taking your time to learn about MagicKey, the perfect password manager for your smartphone that goes with you everywhere. We look forward to you joining our project to make the digital world a safer place.

What you and everyone else needs is MagicKey. MagicKey lets you take proper password management off your to-do list. Delegate the mundane, time consuming, error-prone task to MagicKey. Just remember your master password and then rest assured MagicKey is keeping the passwords for your digital life safe and secure.
We have made phenomenal strides and now need your help to push MagicKey over the finish line and get it out for the world to use.
All the Ways You Can Help
Become a founding customer by pledging your support. We have a life-time subscription option, plus some personal distinction options which include being memorialized on our website for all to see and even being memorialized in the app. And, a select few can help us create some of the Reward Keys.

Include some of our perks with your pledge to show your support to your friends

Use the beta version of MagicKey on your Google Android and tell us your success and any problems you find. If you use PayPal for your contribution you can get access to the beta version within a few days. Unfortunately, using your debit or credit card for your contribution postpones access to the beta version until after the project closes.

Donate smartphones and tablets to us

This helps our testers and developers find and fix weird behavior on various devices before others find the problem
It also allows us to certify MagicKey works on all donated devices 
We are keen to have devices from all continents 
Your device donations will be memorialized on our website for all to see 
Our web site lists the current devices MagicKey is using and more information about donating a device


Participate in translating MagicKey into additional languages 

The mobile app is setup on crowdin.net at translate.cloudvaults.com

The connectivity components will be added soon
The web site will come later



Help spread the word about our project

Like us on Facebook
Follow us on Twitter
Let your friends know you think MagicKey is cool, exciting, useful, etc. 
Use the IndieGoGo share tools too


Closing
Thanks for taking your time to learn about MagicKey, the perfect password manager for your smartphone that goes with you everywhere. We look forward to you joining our project to make the digital world a safer place.

story:
My Healthy Valentine: The At Heart® Emergency Aspirin Dispenser

Tired of giving chocolate or just a card for Valentine’s Day? How about giving a gift that could save a life? February is Heart Month, and what better way to celebrate than to give a potentially lifesaving product to someone you love. We'll help you do this if you help us raise money for new production tooling.

EVERY 63 SECONDS SOMEONE IN THE U.S. DIES FROM A HEART ATTACK

When suffering a heart attack, seconds count. That’s why at the first onset of heart attack symptoms, the American Heart Association recommends calling 911 and chewing an aspirin tablet. When that aspirin tablet is readily available via the At Heart® emergency aspirin dispenser, a life could be saved.

Most heart attacks occur when someone is away from home, and most heart attack deaths occur before the patient gets to the hospital.  At Heart® was invented to enable you to protect yourself by carrying two aspirin tablets with you at all times in a securely protected dispenser.

A lot of people ordered the At Heart® emergency aspirin dispenser at Christmas as a stocking stuffer for someone who is potentially at risk of a cardiac event. Now you can send one with a personalized Valentine’s Day message!

SO WHY DO WE NEED TO RAISE MONEY?

We are not serving the market we need to reach since we are an “internet only” business. In general, the older demographic does not buy products on the internet, and these are the people who have the greatest need for our product. Our phones ring constantly with requests to “tell me what store carries At Heart®” and we have to tell people the answer is none.

Even with the great publicity we received from Rosie O’Donnell's appearance on The Dr. Oz Show, we are still relatively unknown. We need to get At Heart® back in retail distribution across the country, and we need to help spread the word on the benefits this product can offer.

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

We are on a mission. We have two primary goals:

  1. We want to get At Heart® back in retail distribution so it is within reach of everyone who is at risk of having a heart attack. This will save lives. Heart disease is the leading cause of death for men and women in the United States. But we are a small company and we lack the funding for a full scale marketing effort. We want to make At Heart® available at retail locations across America, but the cost of a national rollout has prevented us from doing this. More on the funding issues later.

  2. We need evangelists who believe in At Heart® and our mission to save lives to help us spread the word. We are investing in the future of At Heart® by spending money to market the product and develop retail sales opportunities, but we need some help in getting the word out to people at risk. Each year, over 1 million Americans will suffer a first or recurrent heart attack, and half of them will not survive it. Despite these numbers, most people don’t know if they are at risk for a heart attack, and only about 1 in 4 Americans know the warning signs or what to do if a heart attack is suspected. Even if you do not participate in this project, please forward it to your friends and associates. We need all the help we can get!


By investing in us, you will help us achieve our goal of expanding At Heart® distribution. The Valentine's Day gift will help spread the word on At Heart®. Who knows, we might even help save some lives! 

OUR FUNDING CHALLENGES

We’ve already invested in a redesign of the dispenser to make it easier to open for our elderly consumers. We’ve also simplified the packaging to provide two dispensers instead of a single unit sale (almost all customers buy at least two dispensers). This provides the retailer additional margin to make them more willing to feature and display the item. We've covered the costs for artwork and are ready to buy components. What is stopping us is the need to buy new production tooling, a $3905 expense. That is our fundraising goal. With those funds we can get our retail re-launch back on track!

story:
Short Summary

We are running a 120 mile Ragnar relay race through the Appalachian Montains in West Virginia http://ragnartrailrelay.com/.  The team we have formed, dubbed Free Radicals, is an eclectic bunch (individually introduced below). To the Free Radicals, the Ragnar Relay symbolizes the relay of ideas and information on how to promote sustainability, support local organic agriculture, and encourage wellness through outdoor recreation. These concepts, outside of our friendship and running companionship, bond our team. We are heading to Ragnar to experience a large, well established trail race. Our intention is to bring the energy and enthusiasm of Ragnar back to the Gainesville area. One of our goals is to create similar outdoor recreation experiences in the North Central Florida community.  This campaign, and our run, are to support Eco Agro Trails, a Gainesville-born aspiring non-profit organization.  A prominent focus of EA Trails is to organize outdoor recreation events, specifically trail runs, which support conservation and small agricultural spaces, foster community participation, and encourage personal wellness.  Eco Agro Trails will be holding its first 5k and half marathon trail run on April 6, 2013.  

Eco Agro Trails proudly announces its inaugural 1 Mile Eco Agro Guided Farm Tour, Trail Run 5k, and Trail Run Half Marathon to be hosted at Crones' Cradle Conserve. Crones' Cradle Conserve is an ecological preserve, retreat center, and organic farm http://cronescradleconserve.com/. All proceeds from the race will benefit a local water conservation effort in Marion County and surrounding areas. 

Who we are and why we run:

Dylan Lennon ~ I am often asked why I run. For the past three years, the answer to this question has changed many times. After the pain flows from my body, I start to notice things I didn’t notice before. Running makes my senses ripe. The shade sings. The wind yields to my body and bends behind me. And I can see through the branches of the trees, and the clouds resting above. I notice a patch of sky, serene and sure. I carry it with me as I run. I call it my own.

I am thrilled to participate in Ragnar. Especially because I’ve realized that everyone has their own piece of sky. Our pieces of sky have apparently drifted together, and together we will flight our patches of sky into the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains to see what Summer has in store.

Ori Baber ~ Of the numerous possible personal identifiers, ‘outdoor enthusiast’ and ‘life-long student’, just seem to jibe for me. Running is an essential element of both. Simply: running gets me outside and provides the time and mental space to ponder, ruminate, and assimilate life experiences.  I look forward to the beautiful trails of Ragnar WV. 

Lisa McNett ~ I've been running just over a year now, which is a huge suprise.  Running just seemed so unpleasant.  Some days running is unpleasant, but I still do it.  Some days I feel completely at ease and one with all around me as I run.  Physically and mentally, I am stronger than I have ever been before, which I attribute to running.  

I will run 18 miles over the 24 hours of the Ragnar Relay, a hefty goal which will feel amazing to accomplish.

Melissa Montilla ~ Running is the one thing that came naturally to me.  I definitely get hot and tired, sometimes it hurts, and I am tragically slow, but on the trail I feel as agile and fast as a pony - completely charged by the landscape.  Above all, running connects me to wilderness and wilderness connects me to myself. 

 The Ragnar Trail Relay will be a magnificent challenge for me.  Raising funds and awareness for our local EcoAgro trail running series will be magnificent for our community!

Efren de Paz ~ As a child I spent hours rambling up and down the trails of my fathers farm in Puerto Rico.  For me. this run through the mountains is in honor of him and his stewardship of that place.  Supporting EcoAgro is part of my stewardship of healthy local food and beautiful trails for my daughter.

Andy McNett ~ Running reminds me that I am in charge of my body.  No matter how hard running can seem sometimes, continuing forward comes down to a matter of will--an element of myself that exists seperate from my body.  By focusing on my strength of will, everything else follows.  

This race has inspired me to run farther and faster; raising awareness and support for the environment is something to strive for.   

(side note - June 8 is Andy's birthday!)  

We run by ourselves and for ourselves.

We run with each other and for each other.

We run with the community and for the community.

We are team Free Radical.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Ragnar registration fee: $1060

Van rental: $395 (or you could loan us your van...)

Gas: $280

Indiegogo fee: $104 (4% of our $2600 goal)

Total expenses: $1839

Contribution to Eco Agro: $761 

We'd love to raise even more money for Eco Agro Trails.  We have a dozen fantastic nature / movement / food oriented perks in exchange for your kindness!

The Impact

Eco Agro Trails is an aspiring not-for-profit organization whose mission is to stimulate environmental awareness, foster community participation, and to promote personal wellness through safe, accessible, enjoyable, and educational outdoor recreation http://ecoagrotrails.com/ .  

The bottom line is that going out for some good old-fashioned fresh air and sunshine is integral to our health and wellbeing.  It is this sentiment that we seek to foster among our community and worldwide.

The Free Radicals have chosen to participate in The Ragnar Trail Race, because we believe that Ragnar is a highly accessible, well-organized event that we can emulate in our own community.   Your donation to this campaign will not only get us there, but will help fund local Eco Agro events. 

Eco Agro intends to raise awareness regarding the current state of our accessible water, introduce people to local farms and farmers, promote knowledge about sustainable agriculture, and provide more opportunities to celebrate and explore our place in nature.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word about our campaign... forward to a friend, post on your facebook / twitter / linkedin or any other social media that you use.  THANKS!

story:
Hi, my name is Kevin.  I am the inventor of the ModaDivan Electric Memory Foam Sleeper Sofa. This is my passion and this is my life. With your help we can make this product a part of the sleeper sofa history. I am raising funds so we can launch the TV marketing campaign.

Introducing the new line of automated furniture that offers comfort, style and convenience. ModaDivan presents the New Revolutionary Electric Memory Foam Sleeper Sofa.

THE PRODUCT

ModaDivan  combines  21st century luxury and efficiency in creating the world’s first, motorized, memory foam sleeper sofa.  This revolutionary sleeper sofa is bound to replace the standard pull-out sofa bed and all of the problems and discomfort that accompany it.  ModaDivan’s unique mechanism allows you to convert this memory foam sofa into a memory foam bed within fifteen seconds at the touch of a button which activates two 300 lb. motors strategically located on each side of the sofa. These motors have been used in hospital beds for decades and have a life expectancy of ten plus years. The motors are safe, dependable and replaceable. This unique concept in furniture is designed for the everyday consumer as well as the residential, hospitality, cruise ship and RV industries.

(Showing off the Zero Degree Wall Clearance)

With a zero degree wall clearance, the sofa can be placed flat against a wall and converted into a bed without having to move any furniture.  No more rearranging your room in order to use a pull-out sofa bed. To top things off, you may choose to operate the sofa bed by remote control or by the electric switch while actually sitting or lying on the sofa. And, of course, it is the perfect system for small areas where a pull-out bed would be impossible.

People pay thousands of dollars for memory foam beds alone. Never before could you have a memory foam bed and sofa, all in one, with this fast electric conversion and space saving capacity. You can also design your own sofa appearance to meet your style and fashion needs. ModaDivan is your solution for comfort, convenience, and style

 

( A few after photos from the HGTV Room Crasher Show )

THE REASON

In order to make this product a success in the residential marketplace, we need to advertise to the masses thru TV commercials. After the viewing they may want to see one in person to be able to sit on it, touch it, and to see it in action. That is what this fundraiser is all about; to raise money and to start TV commercials. My objective is then to place them in retail outlets in every major city. We are going to follow the marketing strategy similar to Tempur-pedic, which is a household name brand. With your contributions we can make all of this possible and make available the ModaDiavn electric sleeper sofa for the residential market.

Why is ModaDivan unique?

For any application you can think of, ModaDivan will fit all your needs and more! It is equipped with a power operated remote control that reaches an incredible range of 100 feet or more.
 

Also located on the side of the SOFA is a switch device that can be used while sitting or lying on the sofa.  The simple task of using the remote or switch can instantly give you the most comfortable memory foam sleeper sofa you have been waiting for.
 
 

What Is ModaDivan you ask?

MODA means Stylish, Fashionable and Trendy. DIVAN means Couch or Sofa. ModaDivan is the new stylish, fashionable, ultra-comfortable & trendy sofa hitting the furniture market! This is a fully automated electric sleeper sofa. At the touch of a button the sofa quietly and smoothly moves into a comfortable memory foam bed.

 (ModaDivan arrives at Disney Headquarters Orlando, FL)

( Meeting with Disney Executives. Great for Hotels and Resorts. So many applications you can use the ModaDivan for)

Gives hotels, resorts and timeshares an edge over their competition.
ModaDivan’s new revolutionary sleeper sofa is your answer and solution! Say good-bye to those extra cots for guests; say good-bye to guest room sofas that are uncomfortable, a waste of space, and/or involve the usual disadvantages of the old-fashioned pull-out sleeper sofa. The innovative ModaDivan is the answer to a more efficient, desirable room layout, as well as a more comfortable experience for your guests.

Whether you want 1 or 1000 units, we can meet your specified needs and requirements. With fifty years of manufacturing experience, exceptional craftsmanship and quick turn-around times, we can work on any project, small or large, to meet your budget and delivery times. All products are 100% customizable in design from C.O.M (Customer’s Own Material): Leather, Fabric, and Ultrasuede upholstery.

Transitions in 15 Seconds

ModaDivan’s unique mechanism system allows you to convert your sofa into a bed within fifteen seconds at the touch of a button. You can even sit or lie on the ModaDivan safely while the transition is occurring. Some people have claimed to use it to softly stretch their backs when reclining from a sitting position. With a zero-degree wall clearance, you can have the ModaDivan right up against the wall. You don’t have to move any coffee tables or even get up to convert your sofa into a bed.  Many people pay thousands of dollars for a memory foam bed; some pay thousands for an uncomfortable sleeper sofa. Never before could you have a comfortable, memory foam sofa and bed all in one.

From PROTOTYPE to FINISHED PRODUCT to PATENT

ModaDivan electric sleeper sofa has recently moved to a new manufacture with more production capabilities. We are manufacturing right outside of Orange County, CA. The R&D and prototyping was completed 18 months ago. I received the Patent on this 9 months ago. We are NOW ready to launch TV commercials for marketing campaigns to reach the masses and start placing the ModaDivan where it can be utilized.

 Manufacture Facility

THE SOLUTION

ModaDivan is the perfect solution for the residential customer’s living comfort and convenience. Not only is this product both a memory foam sofa and bed for a reasonable price, but the “zero degree” wall clearance is invaluable. No more moving coffee tables and wrestling with the heavy metal frames of traditional pull-out sofa beds. What could be more convenient than switching from sofa to bed in fifteen seconds by remote control or by the electric switch while you are already sitting or lying on the sofa?

Durability is a major plus of the ModaDivan. It's patented conversion mechanism is powered by time-tested actuators capable of 1200 pounds of movement. These motors are very quiet, safe and reliable with a useful life of over ten years. Similar technology has been used to lift and lower hospital beds for decades.

It’s modern styling, competitive pricing, electric powered conversion mechanism and variety of possible leg, arm and color configurations, makes ModaDivan the sleeper sofa that the residential industry has been waiting for.

 

(Moves only 12 inches into the room- No more moving coffee tables - You don’t even have to get off of the couch to convert it to a bed!!)

Patent received in 2012

Different Applications for the ModaDivan

Now not only is this useful in people’s homes, the ModaDivan can be used in a variety of different applications. One of the main reasons I created this was for the hospitality industry. The timeshare guests main complaint is usually how uncomfortable the sleeper sofas are and that the metal bar is in their backs. I would like to see the hospitality industry, the RV's, cruise liners, trains, private planes  and homes implement the ModaDivan into their everyday living. Also it is my dream that the ModaDivan becomes a name brand in the furniture industry and welcomed by all.

(Residential)

(Hotels)

(Private Jets)

(Yachts and Cruise Ships)

To Sum it all up

ModaDivan is a completed and patented product that is ready to hit the masses through TV commercials. With the contributions that we raise we will be able to start the marketing campaign. The first commercials will be run on HGTV.

The second focus will be to put ModaDivans in as many retail outlets as possible throughout all the major cities. I have had so many requests from people all over the U.S. about where they can experience it first hand.

The third focus will be the hospitality industry for hotels and resorts. It has already been shown at four hospitality trade shows. We have generated much interest in this industry. Our next step is to provide samples for guests at hotels and resorts to experience it for themselves. We are still in talks with Disney as they are reviewing a few other sleeper sofas. So far, they have shown a good interest in the ModaDivan.

 Trade shows that we have been to.

ARDA - American Resort Development Association - Orlando, FL

 HD Boutique - Miami, Fl

 HD Expo - Las Vegas

ARDA-Orlando, FL

Sample for a Hotel in New Hampshire

( Custom build your own ModaDivan on the website )

 

Watch the video below for a demo of the ModaDivan

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69iIJGCXGyE

Take a look at the slide show video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIzKw8kSG4M

Check out the website for more info and photos

http://www.modadivan.com/

 

Thank you for your interest and support!

 

Kevin Smythe

ModaDivan

People pay thousands of dollars for memory foam beds alone. Never before could you have a memory foam bed and sofa, all in one, with this fast electric conversion and space saving capacity. You can also design your own sofa appearance to meet your style and fashion needs. ModaDivan is your solution for comfort, convenience, and style

 
( A few after photos from the HGTV Room Crasher Show )
THE REASON
In order to make this product a success in the residential marketplace, we need to advertise to the masses thru TV commercials. After the viewing they may want to see one in person to be able to sit on it, touch it, and to see it in action. That is what this fundraiser is all about; to raise money and to start TV commercials. My objective is then to place them in retail outlets in every major city. We are going to follow the marketing strategy similar to Tempur-pedic, which is a household name brand. With your contributions we can make all of this possible and make available the ModaDiavn electric sleeper sofa for the residential market.

Why is ModaDivan unique?








For any application you can think of, ModaDivan will fit all your needs and more! It is equipped with a power operated remote control that reaches an incredible range of 100 feet or more.



 



Also located on the side of the SOFA is a switch device that can be used while sitting or lying on the sofa.  The simple task of using the remote or switch can instantly give you the most comfortable memory foam sleeper sofa you have been waiting for.







 


 




What Is ModaDivan you ask?
MODA means Stylish, Fashionable and Trendy. DIVAN means Couch or Sofa. ModaDivan is the new stylish, fashionable, ultra-comfortable & trendy sofa hitting the furniture market! This is a fully automated electric sleeper sofa. At the touch of a button the sofa quietly and smoothly moves into a comfortable memory foam bed.

 (ModaDivan arrives at Disney Headquarters Orlando, FL)



 ( Meeting with Disney Executives. Great for Hotels and Resorts. So many applications you can use the ModaDivan for)
Gives hotels, resorts and timeshares an edge over their competition.ModaDivan’s new revolutionary sleeper sofa is your answer and solution! Say good-bye to those extra cots for guests; say good-bye to guest room sofas that are uncomfortable, a waste of space, and/or involve the usual disadvantages of the old-fashioned pull-out sleeper sofa. The innovative ModaDivan is the answer to a more efficient, desirable room layout, as well as a more comfortable experience for your guests.
Whether you want 1 or 1000 units, we can meet your specified needs and requirements. With fifty years of manufacturing experience, exceptional craftsmanship and quick turn-around times, we can work on any project, small or large, to meet your budget and delivery times. All products are 100% customizable in design from C.O.M (Customer’s Own Material): Leather, Fabric, and Ultrasuede upholstery.
Transitions in 15 Seconds
ModaDivan’s unique mechanism system allows you to convert your sofa into a bed within fifteen seconds at the touch of a button. You can even sit or lie on the ModaDivan safely while the transition is occurring. Some people have claimed to use it to softly stretch their backs when reclining from a sitting position. With a zero-degree wall clearance, you can have the ModaDivan right up against the wall. You don’t have to move any coffee tables or even get up to convert your sofa into a bed.  Many people pay thousands of dollars for a memory foam bed; some pay thousands for an uncomfortable sleeper sofa. Never before could you have a comfortable, memory foam sofa and bed all in one.
From PROTOTYPE to FINISHED PRODUCT to PATENT
ModaDivan electric sleeper sofa has recently moved to a new manufacture with more production capabilities. We are manufacturing right outside of Orange County, CA. The R&D and prototyping was completed 18 months ago. I received the Patent on this 9 months ago. We are NOW ready to launch TV commercials for marketing campaigns to reach the masses and start placing the ModaDivan where it can be utilized.

 Manufacture Facility

THE SOLUTION
ModaDivan is the perfect solution for the residential customer’s living comfort and convenience. Not only is this product both a memory foam sofa and bed for a reasonable price, but the “zero degree” wall clearance is invaluable. No more moving coffee tables and wrestling with the heavy metal frames of traditional pull-out sofa beds. What could be more convenient than switching from sofa to bed in fifteen seconds by remote control or by the electric switch while you are already sitting or lying on the sofa?
Durability is a major plus of the ModaDivan. It's patented conversion mechanism is powered by time-tested actuators capable of 1200 pounds of movement. These motors are very quiet, safe and reliable with a useful life of over ten years. Similar technology has been used to lift and lower hospital beds for decades.
It’s modern styling, competitive pricing, electric powered conversion mechanism and variety of possible leg, arm and color configurations, makes ModaDivan the sleeper sofa that the residential industry has been waiting for.

 







(Moves only 12 inches into the room- No more moving coffee tables - You don’t even have to get off of the couch to convert it to a bed!!)

Patent received in 2012

Different Applications for the ModaDivan
Now not only is this useful in people’s homes, the ModaDivan can be used in a variety of different applications. One of the main reasons I created this was for the hospitality industry. The timeshare guests main complaint is usually how uncomfortable the sleeper sofas are and that the metal bar is in their backs. I would like to see the hospitality industry, the RV's, cruise liners, trains, private planes  and homes implement the ModaDivan into their everyday living. Also it is my dream that the ModaDivan becomes a name brand in the furniture industry and welcomed by all.

(Residential)

(Hotels)

(Private Jets)

(Yachts and Cruise Ships)
To Sum it all up
ModaDivan is a completed and patented product that is ready to hit the masses through TV commercials. With the contributions that we raise we will be able to start the marketing campaign. The first commercials will be run on HGTV.
The second focus will be to put ModaDivans in as many retail outlets as possible throughout all the major cities. I have had so many requests from people all over the U.S. about where they can experience it first hand.
The third focus will be the hospitality industry for hotels and resorts. It has already been shown at four hospitality trade shows. We have generated much interest in this industry. Our next step is to provide samples for guests at hotels and resorts to experience it for themselves. We are still in talks with Disney as they are reviewing a few other sleeper sofas. So far, they have shown a good interest in the ModaDivan.
 Trade shows that we have been to.

ARDA - American Resort Development Association - Orlando, FL

 HD Boutique - Miami, Fl

 HD Expo - Las Vegas

ARDA-Orlando, FL

Sample for a Hotel in New Hampshire


( Custom build your own ModaDivan on the website )
 
Watch the video below for a demo of the ModaDivan
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69iIJGCXGyE
Take a look at the slide show video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIzKw8kSG4M
Check out the website for more info and photos
http://www.modadivan.com/
 
Thank you for your interest and support!
 
Kevin Smythe
ModaDivan

story:
We need your help to be able to hold this amazing Benefit for March of Dimes!

 

Short Summary

We are holding a benefit for MARCH OF DIMES in Memory of Christina Maria Gilmore and need help funding the event in order to make it happen!

 

To see the event posting, please follow this link and scroll down to September 29th under "Calendar of Events"  This is hopefully going to be a terrific fundraiser but we need help!

 

http://www.countycenter.biz/Events.htm

 

CMG Fundraising Foundation was founded and named in memory of Christina Maria Gilmore, the daughter of Jennifer and Robert Gilmore, sister to Kaitlyn.  Christina Maria was born on June 11th, 2011 in only the 23rd week of Jennifer's pregnancy at a mere 12 ounces and 11 inches.

On June 26th, 2011, Christina Maria passed away in the arms of her loving mother.

During her very brief life, Christina Maria alone touched the lives of hundreds of people and created a special, untouchable and unbreakable bond between complete strangers.  Christina Maria is the true symbol of hope, unconditional love and inspiration for us all.

Christina Maria’s legacy continues as she again brings individuals and families, complete strangers, businesses, schools, organizations and foundations together throughout the country to learn from each other, create friendships and help raise desperately needed funds for so many through the help, aid, work and dedication of CMG Fundraising Foundation.

The photo that you see on this campaign is Christina Maria Gilmore.  Even though she was born 17 weeks pre-mature, her facial features are fully developed and her body and extremities, though extremely small, are all that of a full-term newborn.

 

CMG Fundraising Foundation in collaboration with March of Dimes is proud to announce our first benefit in Christina Maria’s name, honor and memory:

 

1st Annual Christina Maria Gilmore

Family Fun Day - Carnival

Benefit for CMG Fundraising Foundation and March of Dimes

 

Featuring Live: Eric Herman and the Invisible Band and Gil Parris

 

September 29th, 2012

9 AM to 6 PM

 

Westchester County Center

White Plains, New York

 

Through this benefit and the incredible work of our volunteers and friends at March of Dimes, it is with great ambition and dedication that we honor the million babies worldwide who died this year, including Christina Maria, because they were born too soon, and the 12 million more who struggle to survive and to focus everyone’s attention on the serious problem of premature birth.

“Although providers have made tremendous advances in caring for babies born too small and too soon, we need to find out how to prevent preterm birth from happening in the first place. Despite decades of research, scientists have not yet developed effective ways to help prevent premature birth.”

It is also time that we help spread awareness about the even lesser known medical conditions that effect pregnant women worldwide - Eclampsia and HELLP Syndrome.

Christina Maria could just very well be alive today if her mother Jennifer had only known about Eclampsia and HELLP Syndrome which were the primary medical conditions that led to Christina Maria’s early birth and untimely death.

“HELLP Syndrome can be difficult to diagnose due to the variability of symptoms among patients (frequently patients have no symptoms other than general abdominal pain), and early diagnosis is key in reducing morbidity.  If not treated in a timely manner, a mother can become critically ill or die due to liver rupture/hemorrhage or cerebral edema.”

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are estimating that the total amount needed to pay for all expenses of this event are $38,000.

 

The only way that we can make this event possible is through the supportive help from you!

 

All funds that we receive from generous contributions will go directly to pay for:

The Venue - Westchester County Center

The Theme - Carnival Company

The Entertainment - Eric Herman and the Invisible Band and Gil Parris

The Unions - Stagehands, Catering, Laborers, Matrons and Porters, Table and Equipment Rentals

Public Safety - Security throughout the event

Personnel - To work at the event

Event Insurance

Publishing - Pamphlets, Brochures, Banners and Promotion

And Every Unexpected Expense That Is Sure To Arise!

 

Once all expenses of the event are fully funded and paid for then any and all funds above will be used towards future events and donated directly to March of Dimes.  Should we not reach our goal of $38,000 through this campaign, then all funds that are donated will go directly to pay for the event and out of pocket funds will be used to cover the remainder of expenses so that the benefit can go on.  All proceeds from this benefit will be donated to CMG Fundraising Foundation and March of Dimes.

We have some extremely exciting benefits for all of our contributors!  Some perks are available through this campaign and many more, primarily for businesses large or small, local or global, are available and can been seen by clicking on the "Gallery" tab above and then clicking under "Files": Corporate Sponsorships

 

Each and every donor will receive recognition on our website!  Without your help, this event may not be possible so we want to personally Thank You for your contribution!

 

The Impact

Premature birth, Eclampsia and HELLP Syndrome are just some of the many complications that can occur during pregnancy and can affect every woman anywhere.  This just may happen to you, your wife, sister, your family member, friend or neighbor at any given time throughout pregnancy. 

Help us and March of Dimes continue to promote awareness of and research into these medical conditions in an effort to find answers and preventative measures to eventually eradicate such a devastating and life changing traumatic experience for families everywhere.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please contact us at: CMGFundraisingFoundation@aol.com if you would like to volunteer at the event or for more information in others ways that you can help.

If you own a business, or know someone who does, and are local to White Plains, NY, please visit our website at: www.CMGFundraisingFoundation.org if you would like to be a vendor at the event.

Ask us to send you brochures from March of Dimes with information about their Prematurity Campaign that you can distribute on their behalf.

Word of mouth and by posting the link to this campaign on your website, your social media sites and on all of your emails will help us reach our goal more than we can ever hope for!

Indiegogo also makes it very easy to spread the word just by using their share tools found on this campaign page!

Please help us help all of the unborn children have a chance at life!  Help us and March of Dimes find ways to prevent premature birth.  Thank you so very much for all of your efforts!

story:
So this young lady is in real trouble and not just medically. Her car broke down and she is unemployed. She and her son are about to be evicted. She also desperately needs to get into some sort of program and would benefit greatly from a personal trainer that could help her make a lifestyle change and teach her the right way to lose the weight. She is in Columbus, GA so if anybody knows anyone in that area that might be able to donate some time and advice that would be fantastic!
 This campain is not as much about the money although it would help. It's more about making noise and spreading the word and showing support. I hope that if we made enough noise maybe she would get on a show that could help like Biggest Loser or The Doctors. So please check out her video and like and share!

Thank you in advance for all of your love and support!

story:
The LARQ bottle is a reusable, rechargeable, insulated water bottle that cleans itself and the water you put inside it. With digital purification from UVC light, your water and bottle is purified at the touch of a button.
 
  

 

We all want to drink more water and use less plastic, but existing reusable bottles do not make it easy. We surveyed 200+ people and found these common issues: 
 


The results are appalling with more than a million bottles every minute being added to landfills around the world. That’s over 480 billion annually and climbing - enough plastic to wrap around the earth’s equator more than twice. Every. Year.
 


That’s a statistic you don’t want to be a part of. Bottom line is that the existing reusable bottles are failing to curb the use of plastic bottles.

That’s why we started LARQ  with a simple idea: Pure water from a self-cleaning bottle.
 


The LARQ Bottle is designed to solve the biggest consumer pain points so there are no more excuses to reach for that one-use plastic bottle.


  


 

   
   

 


 


Whether you’re on the trail, at the gym, or in the office, you know that staying hydrated helps you feel and perform your best. So don’t think twice about whether you want to grab a refill.
 


Explore new trails and new countries with confidence. Even when you’re not sure about your water source, you can count on LARQ to eliminate bacterial and viral contaminants.
 


When your body needs water the most, make sure it’s getting the best. The inside of your water bottle should be a whole lot cleaner than the inside of your gym bag.
 


Clean water isn’t a privilege, it’s a right. The LARQ Bottle gives you the power to take pure water with you everywhere you go, sanitizing enough water for your whole family with a single charge.
 


LARQ combines the power of the sun with the advances of the digital age. The UVC LED chips in LARQ are smaller, more energy efficient, less toxic (mercury free), and more economical compared to traditional Mercury based UV technology.
 

 

 

 

 

 



 






663 million people in the world live without safe drinking water. We believe technology and design has the ability to transform lives. That is why we are continually exploring innovative ways of working with nonprofit organizations to bring our core technology to the millions in need of access to clean water.

When you support the LARQ Bottle - we will donate 1% of all proceeds to our charity partner charity: water

  
  

 
  

 

  

We are LARQ. LARQ was started with a simple vision where innovative technology can be combined with inspirational design to help people access pristine drinking water easily and sustainably. We harness the power of the sun to bring that stinky water bottle to the digital age.

No chemicals, no scrubbing, no compromises.

Our products look as good as they make you feel. We are confident that these are the most beautiful hydration products in the world that make it easy to make the healthier and sustainable choice, anytime and anywhere.

You are what you drink. So drink brilliantly.
