As an example, take my medical resonance project, the principle has been demonstrated in an lab experiment and deemed viable but the large farmaceutical companies will not invest or invstigate because they would not be able to sell threatments on a continuous basis, therefore they will avoid this type of projects.
It is my intention to try and raise monies to enable me to independently promote some of this projects, which if sucessefull will help lots of others wether the money is made or not.
However that is not to say that making money from a business is wrong, take my hybrid turbine variations of this design can be build cheaply and it will be a cheap and unique power generator for the third world countries using steam.
From a commercial standpoint, any money generated can go thowards others projects as well as making a good return for the initial sponsors. But making money is not the first goal. Its to help others, but by helping others you help yourself.
But large companies do not operate like this and will not fund projects like mine.
To further some of the following projects it will be necessary to purchase equipment and to retain expertise and to provide funding for the patents, this is not exactly cheap.
A sample of the projects can be found on my website front page
The problems of an inventor book
I have been inventing all my life. Not only must you think of the invention, then you must build it, then you must also then try to interest others which is the main problem an inventor faces.
The basic problem is raising funds either privately or from governments which is a huge issue.
I am therefore writing a book, that may help others to understand the problems and dificulties that an inventor faces.
Working project list as an example


Elevator Project (*)
Public Transport systems

Engine Concept Mk2 (*)
New IC engine Concept Mk 3
Aerospace advanced propulsion systems
Subsea Ice Technology
Charged Baloon Lifting System
New dome construction Technique
Power generation system Mk1
Power Generation Mk2
New Oil drilling bit concept
Identifying and eradication various pathogens
Small projects to generate useful income to advance science and the wellbeing of all
ThinkTank or problem solving consultancy for those who need help
(* Project information with video)
Additional links
Cuthbert-physics.com
Readers Digest - Meet Britain's most prolific inventor

story:
What is YOUR 2019 New Year’s Resolution? 

Year after Year the 3 most common

New Year’s Resolutions are:

1. Lose Weight
2. Exercise More
3. Eat Healthier


Use RIDM 1 Min. per Day:
LEARN what WORKOUTS & DIETS are EFFECTIVE for YOU

 

“I used RIDM once a day just looking at my body fat and muscle. I saw that cutting down my carbohydrate intake was the most effective in reducing body fat. Checking my muscle composition for imbalances, I realized I had been skipping leg days so I changed up my routine to focus on legs at least twice a week. I started in January and by mid-March, my whole body shape had changed.” - Jack Kim

 

FITNESS ≠ WEIGHT

Your fitness and health cannot be measured by numbers on a scale, waist size or image in the mirror. Take a data-driven approach to your fitness by understanding your body composition and tracking how it changes.

A healthy body composition is a healthy balance of fat and muscle in relation to your total body weight. Body composition is a crucial health indicator used by both physicians and personal trainers the world over.

 

THE RIDM DIFFERENCE

Existing portable body composition analyzers including body fat scales suffer from an accuracy problem. Not only do they take an impartial reading of the body, using one frequency they lack the technology to measure total body composition.

RIDM is the FIRST portable body composition analyzer with MEASUREMENT TECHNOLOGY and ACCURACY equivalent to PROFESSIONAL-GRADE Body Composition machines.

 

1. MEASURING BODY SEGMENTS INDIVIDUALLY
  : RIDM is capable of scanning imbalances in body composition.
 

2. USING MULTIPLE FREQUENCIES (5 FREQUENCIES)
  : RIDM is capable of measuring your water weight on a cellular level.  

 

PROVEN ACCURACY

 

RIDM has undergone clinical testing for accuracy compared to body composition leaders, InBody and the DEXA Index. RIDM's unique measurement of individual body segments offers heightened accuracy.

RIDM v.s. InBODY SCALE (MSRP $20,000 USD)

BODY FAT PERCENTAGE: RIDM   14.5% | InBody   14.9%
Measurement Differential   0.4%

SKELETAL MUSCLE MASS: RIDM   32.2kg. | InBody   31.9 kg.
Measurement Differential   0.3 kg.

 

 

RIDM TEAM

RIDM is developed with the support of LG Electronics.

“With RIDM, our goal is to help everyone find a personalized fitness routine. Every person is different. Therefore, the changes every person can make towards a healthy body composition are also different. RIDM is as accurate as professional grade Inbody machines, and portable so you can test body composition in the comfort of your own home. NO one size fits all fitness plan. NO expensive fitness testing. By understanding YOUR body composition, YOU can take charge of YOUR healthy lifestyle.” 

 

RIDM in EBPMAN TECH REVIEWS

“The things that really stands out to me is the awesome breakdown between body fat and skeletal muscle, this will give an idea of the lean mass you have on your body frame.
This kind of info is really important especially if your are someone who is serious about nutrition.” - Matt Ambrose (Co-owner - My Life Fitness)

 

As Seen On

   

 

IN RIDM APPLICATION (ANDROID & iOS)

 

 

 

Use the RIDM app to receive the full breakdown of the individual components that make up your body:

 Total Body Fat(%) & Total Skeletal Muscle(kg or lbs)

  • Skeletal muscle breakdown (5 sections): left upper body, right upper body, left lower body, right lower body, and belly
  • Balance between your right & left, upper & lower body
  • Body Composition Analysis (body water, protein, minerals, body fat)
  • Basal Metabolic Rate
  • Body Type & Health Summary

 

LEARN HOW ACTIVITY CHANGES BODY COMPOSITION

 

  1.  Track your body fat and muscle over time using RIDM’s Body Test
  2.  Sync activity data (including health data + weight) tracked on Google Health, iHealth, and Fitbit.
  3. Compare activity to changes in body composition. Track activity, weight, muscle/fat changes all on one-screen with the RIDM app.
  4. Vary exercise routines to learn which activities are most effective for YOU
  5. Create a healthy lifestyle pattern that promotes positive body composition results.

 

PORTABLE, CONVENIENT & DISCREET​

 

POCKET-SIZED, so you can measure your body composition anywhere & anytime.
RIDM is just 2 1/4 (diameter) x 1/2 (width) inches and weights an ultralight 32 grams

 

One full charge last FIVE MONTHS (assuming one measurement a day).
A micro USB cable will be included in RIDM package for charging

 

Your body composition data is PRIVATE to YOUR PHONE (save & view function).
Change phones but want to keep your fitness logs?
We provide a data backup (export & import) function. 

 

 

Timeline

 

THE SCIENCE ​OF RIDM

1. Why is Body Composition?

Body composition is body fat and muscle mass in relation to your bones, body tissue, organs and water weight. At the same weight, someone with high body fat and low muscle mass will be vulnerable to health risks, decreased immunity and more rapid aging. Body composition also is reflected in body shape or visual appearance.

Even if you are at a healthy weight, a beer belly means an excess of visceral fat, which can increase risk of cardiovascular disease and type-2 diabetes. In your 30s, muscle mass naturally begins to decrease. Starting at 40, if you’re physically inactive, total muscle mass can decrease up to 1% every year. Healthy development of muscle mass alone, can improve overall fitness and lower risk of high blood pressure, high cholesterol and hip disease.

2. How do you Measure Body Composition?

BIA or Bio-electrical Impedance Analysis, analyzes your body composition on the cellular level. By sending a small alternating current through the body, BIA is capable of measuring total body water and resistance to the passage of the current through your body. From this measurement, fat-free body mass, body weight and body fat can be derived.

3. Why Measure using Five Frequencies?

Lower frequency currents can only measure extracellular water. Meanwhile, higher frequency currents are needed to pass through cell walls measuring intracellular water mass. Multi-frequency measurement highly improves accuracy with the ability to gauge both extracellular and intracellular water mass. Whereas traditional BCA machines used a single frequency at 50kHz, RIDM operates across a range of five frequencies

4. How do you Measure Body Composition with RIDM?

RIDM offers two distinct modes to measure body composition. Easy mode offers a quick, time-efficient scan. Segmental mode offers heightened accuracy by measuring your body across five cross-sections.

We recommend using Easy mode daily & Segmental mode once per week.

 

Easy Mode

 

 

Segmental Mode

 

 

 

 

Durability & Warranty

RIDM will offer a 6-month limited warranty for all faulty products. Once the claim is processed, a replacement RIDM will be delivered free of charge. For more information, please e-mail: ridm.crowdfunding@gmail.com 

 

Precautions & Disclaimer

RIDM does not claim to offer any medical advice, diagnosis or treatment and under no circumstances should it be substituted for it. Please only use RIDM for routine checks to monitor dieting and exercise progress. If you have any health problems, please consult with your doctor or medical professional. Please do not use RIDM if you are pregnant, currently under treatment by any electronic medical device, require assistance from any electronic support system, or have undergone operation for any metallic aids or implants. Particular care should be taken if you require the assistance of a pacemaker or defibrillator, or if you have undergone procedure for an artificial heart or lung. For people under the age of 18 or over the age of 70, RIDM may not provide accurate readings of body composition.

 

Risks and Challenges

A working prototype of RIDM has already completed development. As the most accurate portable body composition scan available, the challenge moving forward will be to continuously upgrade accuracy and consistency of measurement Through data acquired through repeated measurements, RIDM’s internal algorithm will be updated regularly to combat inconsistencies. RIDM’s firmware will be upgraded through app update. In Korea, the first phase of clinical trials has concluded and a second round of testing is currently scheduled

story:
My friend Krista was diagnosed with breast cancer on October 25, 2010.  She has stage IV metastatic breast cancer which means that it has spread throughout her entire body.  She has had cancer in her bones, liver, lungs, and brain in addition to her breasts.  Thankfully her bones and liver are okay, but there is still cancer in her brain and her breasts. 

She began chemo and radiation therapy in November 2010 and only a short time later, just before Christmas, she began to lose her hair.  She has remained strong for almost two years now. She was able to stop radiation treatments and slowly her hair began to grow back.  Although she lost her hair she didn’t lose hope.  Unfortunately, after going to the doctor this week, Krista learned that she has a new growth in her right breast and is going to need a mastectomy and radiation therapy.  Not only is she going to lose one of her breasts, she’s going to lose what little hair she has all over again.

I have extremely long hair and I am going to have cut and turned into a wig for her.  We are doing this on Saturday August 4, 2012.  It is going to be costly getting this wig made for her but after everything she has been through she deserves the best! It will cost $1500 for the wig alone. That is the base cost it might even be more! 

I don't have any extra breasts to offer her but I can help raise money for that too! I'm trying to help her raise an additional $1500 for the implants.

I have started this campaign to help raise money to pay for a beautiful wig for Krista made out of the finest hair (I grew it myself!), and also to help pay for an implant after the mastectomy.  With the rising cost of Krista’s medical bills, the stress of finding money for a wig and rockin’ new boobs comes second.  Let’s raise the money that she needs so she doesn’t have to worry about it!  Thank you all so much and God Bless!

story:
We are from the Indian Institute of Technology Madras, alumni and final years.

We have a story to share, a request to make.

We have been through what it is like to require blood at the crucial hour. We know what it is to frantically call known and unknown people alike to ask if they would be able to donate blood. We know what it is to see your loved one on a hospital bed, ready for an operation, but waiting for blood.

And then it dawned upon us. If smart phones and the Internet can help us share photographs and videos instantly with our friends, why not use that connectivity for saving lives? Can we create a social group of people who can help each other during an emergency? And, thus began Bloodline Labs (http://bloodlinelabs.com)

Bloodline is a network and a mobile application to help you connect with blood donors and healthcare facilities instantaneously. At the critical hour, what if your mobile could help you find donors? And instead of providing you with an outdated list of regular-donors who may or may not be available to help you, Bloodline will contact people at that very moment, just for you.

 

Here's how it works, in a nutshell.

Receive Help - right when you need it.

 

Donate Blood - save someone's life.



Admittedly, almost all of us just ignore those "Blood Required" e-mails that we get. Little do we realize that on the other end, it is actually a person, a human being like you or I who actually needs this life-force-fluid to even live. It is a privilege to be sitting behind a laptop and safely marking those emails as read.

We hope to sensitise you to this problem of Blood Donation. It is a simple affair - takes hardly half an hour of your time. It means being able to live for someone else.

Our idea has been receiving good response from various platforms, both in India, and abroad, right from the NASSCOM Social Innovation Honors to the Stanford E-Bootcamp. And now we’ve taken the idea further. We are a step closer to achieving what we started. The Bloodline Android Application is out. Download the Bloodline App from the Google Play Store now. A click of the button now, and you would probably be saving a life tomorrow.

 

How can you help?

We intend to keep Bloodline a free service. It makes no sense to us to ask someone to pay to find someone to donate blood. It's a matter of crucial importance, and we cannot let money tamper with our humanity. However, we need your help to keep this running. Our costs include infrastructure, such as server space, hosting, services, etc. We hope to be able to reach out to greater crowds through on-ground publicity, for which we again need investments for posters, so on and so forth. It is our goal to bridge this dire need for blood. We hope money, or lack thereof doesn't stand in our way. We need your help.



We came together to make a difference. We know that you will stand by us. 

Here's where else we are on the internet.

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/bloodlinelabs
Google Plus - https://plus.google.com/116574822854889533194

story:
Fitness is my passion

I have been an athlete since I first climbed out of my crib at fourteen months old.  I may have fallen, and fallen hard as the story is told, but I'll be damned if the next night I didn't try again.  I believe that it was since then that my passion and persistence for sports and fitness began.  Playing every sport throughout high school (MVP in many), a few in college and then boxing post school, fitness never left my world.  However, it may have left my day-to-day life.  While dealing with family tragedies, I put on 90+ pounds and didn't think I would ever get back to where I once was.  It wasn't until I was introduced to places like Flywheel Sports and Barry's Boot camp and met incredible friends and amazingly inspiring people there, that I realized that the passion for fitness that I thought I lost, was only just hidden.

Fit Journey is born

It was through my weight gain, loss of hope and regaining of hope AND passion that Fit Journey was born.  The excitement and beauty I feel from fitness and the feelings behind getting stronger and bettering myself through my own actions is something that I think every person should feel.  Being overweight is tough, period.  But, if one person can connect with me, can see me as their equal going through this journey with them and better themselves, than this whole website is worth it.  However, by helping me fund this project, I can help and connect with so many people.  This is a website with no judgment, no pre-determined expectations beside being good to yourself and working alongside me and our Fit Journey community.

What we need

We are very lucky in that we have secured enough funding for the first two months for the site.  However, to really hit the core demographic we are looking to reach, and make sure the site is able to run till then, that will take six months.

Your Support Will Go Toward

-Since we are an Internet based business, we want to hire an online social marketing team to really get our name out there.

-Production costs for training (strength, yoga etc) video shoots

-Production costs for cooking video shoots

-Paying our top fitness and health experts and writers for their articles

-Adding more features to the website

 

The Impact

There are amazing videos, TV shows & articles on weight loss and bettering yourself out there.  However, there are no heroes.  There is no one out there for 1/3 of the population of the US to look up to and really go through the journey WITH.  In REAL time and really getting to know this person.  I want to reach out to people and become their inspiration as they go through this journey with me.  Every piece of my journey, good, bad, beautiful and hideous will be out there.  Your support will help us change lives.  Your support will help us meet people, reach people and inspire people.  It will help us create and give the tools needed to change people's lives and that is what I am so beyond excited about.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell one! Tell all!  We would love for you to get the word out.  We would love to have you tell friends, family members, trainers, doctors, neighbors, cats, dogs, EVERYONE.

We are very lucky in that we have secured enough funding for the first two months for the site.  However, to really hit the core demographic we are looking to reach, and make sure the site is able to run till then, that will take six months.
Your Support Will Go Toward
-Since we are an Internet based business, we want to hire an online social marketing team to really get our name out there.
-Production costs for training (strength, yoga etc) video shoots
-Production costs for cooking video shoots
-Paying our top fitness and health experts and writers for their articles
-Adding more features to the website
 
The Impact
There are amazing videos, TV shows & articles on weight loss and bettering yourself out there.  However, there are no heroes.  There is no one out there for 1/3 of the population of the US to look up to and really go through the journey WITH.  In REAL time and really getting to know this person.  I want to reach out to people and become their inspiration as they go through this journey with me.  Every piece of my journey, good, bad, beautiful and hideous will be out there.  Your support will help us change lives.  Your support will help us meet people, reach people and inspire people.  It will help us create and give the tools needed to change people's lives and that is what I am so beyond excited about.
Other Ways You Can Help
Tell one! Tell all!  We would love for you to get the word out.  We would love to have you tell friends, family members, trainers, doctors, neighbors, cats, dogs, EVERYONE.

story:
Zur Deutschen Version (See German Version)


How pixx.io works

Featured in

Technology

Hardware

The pixx.io box is a mini server with embedded media management software. It is set up for use in your home, in your office, or in your photographic studio. The pixx.io box is perfect for everyone who has to deal with masses of photos and files. Whether you are a hobby snapper, a professional photographer, or working as a marketing & communications manager in a SME.

Technical Specs

SIZE: 22 cm x 22 cm x 4.2 cm
8.7 inch x 8.7 inch x 1.7 inch
POWER: AC adapter for 230 V or 120 V
CONNECT: 1 x RJ45 Gigabit LAN, 2 x USB 3.0, 1 x eSATA
HARDDRIVES 2 x 1 TB 2.5" HDD, Mirrored with RAID 1
FLASHDRIVE 1 x 30 GB, 550 MB/s (read), 520 MB/s (write)
MEMORY 2 GB RAM DDR3
PROCESSOR: Intel Celeron J1900 Quadcore, 4 x 2.0 GHz (passive cooling)


Software

pixx.io is the home for all your photos and files. It is the basis for archiving, collecting and sharing all kinds of media. Fast, easy and safe.

Find your files faster, manage them efficiently

Using pixx.io you will always find the photos and files you are looking for, right when you need them. Simply type in a keyword and the matching files appear. Additionally, you can filter your media by date, GPS coordinates, size, orientation and many further characteristics. When managing or editing your data, you can use the batch bulk processing function of pixx.io. This makes working with your photos and files easy and efficient.

Collections facilitate your daily workflow

If your images are used, downloaded or shared together frequently, collections will facilitate your daily workflow. This applies if you are collecting photos for the next catalogue, sending out a portfolio once in a while, or simply want to group files together for various projects. The collections feature of pixx.io offers everything you need for a fast and efficient workflow.

Share your files – fast and secure

Using pixx.io you can share your photos with customers, colleagues and friends – quickly and securely. You decide which size you give out your files. You determine how long and how often the recipient can open the shared collection. Furthermore you need just one click to integrate a watermark in all the pictures, no matter if you are sharing five or 500 files. In addition every sharing activity is recorded, meaning you have full control on who shared what with whom, in which format.

The addressee will then get a link via email to view and download the shared collection. They can use their laptop, smartphone or tablet. No additional software installation is needed.

On the pixx.io box your photos and files are safe

With the help of the pixx.io box all your photos and files are in your office, living room or photographic studio. No files will be saved on servers  around the world, no strangers will have access to your files. Even if you are sharing photos with pixx.io, only the selected files in the format you chose will be sent. The original files will remain untouched and only on your pixx.io box at all time.

At the same time the pixx.io box offers all the advantages of a cloud solution. It is the same if you are using a Mac or Microsoft, the same if you are using a laptop, a tablet or a smartphone – you will always have fast and easy access to your photos and files without installing anything on the device you are using.


How the pixx.io box can help you

Share your files & maintain control

The pixx.io box allows you to share your files with friends, colleagues and customers quickly easy. At the same time it helps you maintain control over your shared files by setting timeframes for the usage, resizing images before they are shared and adding watermarks.

Always find the files you need

The intuitive text search field, the several filters (e.g. size, orientation, date created, etc…) and the GPS location scanner help you find the right photos and files, when you need them. No more clicking through complicated folder structures.

Protect your pictures with watermarks

If you are sharing photos, you may want to make sure they contain a watermark. With one click pixx.io burns freely selectable and irreversible watermarks on these files. No matter if you are sharing five or 500 pictures.

Process your files faster

A fast 2 GHz quad-core processor ensures that even large files of 50 MB or more are processed and archived quickly and smoothly.

Work more efficiently

Batch bulk processing is the best way to make your work more efficient. It works the same if you are editing, tagging or downloading images. A single click will change and move all selected files at the same time.

Your files are safe

Two permanently mirrored hard drives guarantee your important photos and files are safe at all times. Even in the unlikely event of a hard drive crash you will not lose a single byte.

Access files with any device

It’s the same with tablet, smartphone, laptop or desktop computer. You can access all the files stored on the pixx.io box with any device in your network that runs a browser.

The originals stay untouched

It does not matter what you are doing with your files - resizing, sharing or adding watermarks. You are always working with identical copies. The originals are always untouched, unless you decide to delete them.

Pledges and Rewards

The team behind the pixx.io box

Christoph Trautbeck

is head developer of pixx.io. After finishing his studies in software engineering, he founded the company w-solution which is focused on creating web applications for desktop and mobile devices. This is how he gathered 13 years of experience in developing software and hardware solutions.

Richard Michel

is the product manager of the pixx.io box, and is responsible for project coordination at pixx.io. He is very active in the field of hardware design and hardware testing. Furthermore he makes sure our suppliers deliver on time. Together with Christoph Trautbeck he has 13 years of experience running an IT company and in developing software and hardware solutions.

Andreas Gölkel

is a photo enthusiast and heavy user of the pixx.io photo database. He started working as a freelance journalist at the age of 16, nine years ago. Since then he has archived all his photos. At pixx.io he is responsible for marketing and communications. He acquired the basics for this job at several companies and during his Bachelors and Masters studies in Passau (Germany), Helsinki (Finland), Salamanca (Spain) and Nuremberg (Germany).

Robert Schwarzenböck

is co-developer of the pixx.io box. He is IT specialist for application development. At pixx.io he is responsible for coding, testing and improving the pixx.io box.

Claudia Trautbeck

takes care of pixx.io's finances. She does the bookkeeping and handles all financial issues. As she loves to create photobooks herself, she is a valuable idea generator and beta tester of the pixx.io box.

Production Timeline

Strech goals

Shipping

Where we ship

We ship to the EU, the US and Canada. Free shippingin the EU. Add 30€ for shipping to the US and Canada.

When we start shipping 

We start shipping in February 2015. We will notify you when your pixx.io box is on its way to you. If there is a balance due, we will charge the rest to your credit card at this time. The pixx.io box will take about a week to get to you if you are in the EU, and 2-3 weeks if you are in the US or Canada.

Risks and Challenges

The biggest risk we face is undiscovered bugs in the pixx.io software. Until now we developed a very stable beta version of the software, which runs the pixx.io box. To find bugs and improve the software we are working together with various SMEs, professional/semi-professional photographers and design agencies, who are beta testing pixx.io. During this intensive improvement process problems might arise that our programmers never considered. This might, in the worst case, delay the delivery of pixx.io box.

To meet international standards we are testing the pixx.io box according to CE and FCC guidelines. Experts have assured us we will not have problems passing the tests. But there is still the risk we will not meet the standards the first time. If so, we would need to adjust the enclosure of the pixx.io box, and test it again. This might, in the worst case, delay the delivery of pixx.io box.

For the production of the pixx.io box we are working together with an experienced hardware supplier. He is able to scale production to our needs. But, if the number of supporters exceeds all we imagined in our wildest dreams, the supplier might need to reserve more production capacities for the pixx.io box. This might also result in a delay of the delivery date.

FAQ

  1. Hardware
    • Is the pixx.io box just a NAS (Network Attached Storage)?
    • What voltage does the pixx.io box use?
    • How much memory space do I have on my pixx.io box?
    • How safe are the photos stored on my pixx.io box?
    • What happens if the storage space on my pixx.io box is full?
    • Do I need to be an IT pro to install and to use the pixx.io box?
    • How many users can have access to my pixx.io box?
  2. Software
    • Which languages does the pixx.io box support?
    • Which file formats can I upload to my pixx.io box?
    • Do I need to install any software to use pixx.io?
    • Do I need a special operating system to use pixx.io?
    • Which browser do I need to use pixx.io?
    • Can I use pixx.io on my tablet?
    • Can I use pixx.io on my smartphone?
  3. Indiegogo
    • I preordered a pixx.io box, but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?
    • There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
    • What shall I add in shipping cost?
    • How do I add 30 € for Shipping to US and Canada?
    • When will the pixx.io box be shipped?
    • What is your return policy and warranty?
    • Will I get an invoice from pixx.io?
    • Can I order multiple units on Indiegogo?
    • If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

Hardware

Is the pixx.io box just a NAS (Network Attached Storage)?

No. The pixx.io box is a mini server with a high performance processor. This means, the pixx.io box does not just store photos and files, but processes them efficiently. High-resolution JPGs, RAW-files and PSDs for example are directly converted into small JPGs (1920px width). These files are used whenever possible. At the same time the originals are archived and stay untouched until you need them. Further all images are resized on demand for optimal fit to the screen of your device (laptop, desktop, tablet, etc.) This drastically reduces loading and processing times.

What voltage does the pixx.io box use?

The power supply of the pixx.io box comes with an external power adapter. Depending on the country you are ordering from you will get the power adapter you need. If you are ordering from an EU country you will get a 230V adapter. If you are ordering from Canada or the US, you will get a 120V adapter.

How much memory space do I have on my pixx.io box?

The pixx.io box contains two 1 TB hard drives. To guarantee the highest possible safety for your data, the hard drives are completely mirrored. You can effectively use 1 TB to store your photos and data. This means you can manage about 200,000 files (assuming 5 MB per file). Additionally you have a complete backup of all your files. The pixx.io software runs on a separate 30 GB flash drive.

Furthermore you can store up to 1,000 pictures and two collections in the pixx.io cloud account you get for free with your pixx.io box.

How safe are the photos stored on my pixx.io box?

The files you store on your pixx.io box are very safe. Because of the two independently working, and constantly mirrored hard drives, your files always exist twice on your pixx.io box. This means if, for any reason, one hard drive breaks down, your files are still secured on the second hard drive.

What happens if the storage space on my pixx.io box is full?

In your pixx.io box you can effectively use 1 TB of storage. This is enough for plenty of photos and files. If you are really running out of storage at some point, you can get the pixx.io box storage extension. This extension is simply connected with the eSATA port at the back of the pixx.io box. With this extension you can enlarge the storage space of your box. The user interface, all the functions and your existing files remain as they are, just your storage is enlarged.

Do I need to be an IT pro to install and to use the pixx.io box?

No. There is no need to be an IT pro for installing and using your pixx.io box. You simply need to plug the pixx.io box in to your existing network (e.g. via your router/FRITZ!Box/etc...). After that you can access pixx.io with any browser on any device in your network. The only thing you need is the login data which comes with the box.

How many users can have access to my pixx.io box?

The number of users is unlimited as long as they are using the same user account. You will have one general account with full rights and one guest account with limited rights. You can also work with various devices and one pixx.io box at the same time.

If you are in need of a solution with detailed user and rights management please contact the pixx.io team. In this case the pixx.io server version offers you a broad range of features adapted for the needs of SMEs and larger companies.

Software

Which languages does the pixx.io box support?

pixx.io is multilingual. This means theoretically every language can be implemented very easily. In the beginning you can chose between the two languages English (US) and German. Eventually we will offer new language packages (like French, Spanish and Finnish) to download. Each time you log into pixx.io you can choose between all the languages installed.

The user manual and support videos will only be available in English and German.

Which file formats can I upload to my pixx.io box?

You can upload nearly every file format to pixx.io and work with it. But you have to keep in mind that pixx.io is optimized for images and graphic files (e.g. jpg, png, gif, psd, idd, pdf, etc...) This is why some functions can only be applied to these file formats.

Do I need to install any software to use pixx.io?

No. All the software you need is preinstalled on the pixx.io box. The only thing you need is a device with a browser (e.g Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Internet Explorer, etc...) on it.

Do I need a special operating system to use pixx.io?

No. You can use pixx.io with any operating system. It works equally well with Microsoft, Apple, Linux or Android. The operating system only needs to be able to run a browser.

Which browser do I need to use pixx.io?

pixx.io is ready to be used with any browser. Currently we are optimizing the software for the latest versions of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Internet Explorer and Apple Safari.

Can I use pixx.io on my tablet?

Yes, you can. pixx.io is optimized for use on tablets, laptops and desktop computers.

Can I use pixx.io on my smartphone?

Yes, there is a mobile version of pixx.io as well, due to the limited screen size you will not have all functions available when using pixx.io on your smartphone. For the best experience, use pixx.io on your tablet, laptop or desktop computer.

Indiegogo

I preordered a pixx.io box, but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?

Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact us at info@pixx.io with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve them: Common Contribution Errors.

What shall I add in shipping cost?

Shipping is free to Germany and all EU countries. If you live in the US or Canada, please add 30€ for shipping.

How do I add 30 € for Shipping to US and Canada?

1. Select your pixx.io Perk Package
2. Edit the Euro Amount to be 30€ more
3. Purchase
If the pixx.io box has already been purchased:
1. Select "International Shipping Add-On"
2. Use the SAME mailing address you entered when you purchased your pixx.io box
3. Purchase

When will the pixx.io box be shipped?

We expect the pixx.io box to be ready for shipping in February  2015

What is your return policy and warranty?

We have a global replacement warranty of 12 months after invoice of the goods.

Will I get an invoice from pixx.io?

Yes, if you ordered a pixx.io box, you will get an official invoice from pixx.io, as soon as we send out the pixx.io box. If you are ordering from an EU country, the invoice indicates the price you paid on Indiegogo including 19% German VAT.

If you are ordering on behalf of an company based in Europe and you are entitled to deduct pre-tax, this document should meet the requirements.

Can I order multiple units on Indiegogo?

Yes, you can do so without any problems. Additionally, we will have a pre-order web shop online when the Indiegogo campaign ends. You will easily be able to pre-order there.

If I have questions, how can I reach your team?
Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible!
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com.
If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at: info@pixx.io

Our address:

Bahnhofstr. 25

84453 Mühldorf

Germany

Thank you!

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project through Facebook and Twitter, and spread the word about the pixx.io box!

Press KIT

For Press Inquiries please contact: press@pixx.io or +49 / 8631 / 98 98 14 222


German Version

Diese Medien haben schon berichtet:

Die Technik

Hardware

Die pixx.io box ist ein moderner Mini-Server mit integrierter Medienverwaltung zum Sammeln, Teilen und Archivieren von Fotos und Medien. Sie ist perfekt für jeden, der regelmäßig mit Fotos und Mediendateien arbeitet - egal ob Hobbyfotograf, Fotoprofi, selbstständiger Unternehmer oder Marketingmanager im Mittelstand. Sie passt ins Wohnzimmer genauso wie auf den Schreibtisch oder das eigene Fotostudio.

Technische Details

Abmessungen: 22 cm x 22 cm x 4.2 cm
8.7 inch x 8.7 inch x 1.7 inch
Strom: Externes Netzteil für 230 V oder 120 V
Anschlüsse: 1 x RJ45 Gigabit LAN, 2 x USB 3.0, 1 x eSATA
Festplatten: 2 x 1 TB 2.5" HDD, gespiegelt mit RAID 1
SSD-Speicher: 1 x 30 GB, 550 MB/s (read), 520 MB/s (write)
Arbeitsspeicher: 2 GB RAM DDR3
Prozessor: Intel Celeron J1900 Quadcore, 4 x 2.0 GHz (passiv gekühlt)

Software

Die pixx.io box ist ein moderner Mini-Server mit integrierter Medienverwaltung zum Sammeln, Teilen und Archivieren von Fotos und Medien.

Mediendateien schnell finden und einfach verwalten

In pixx.io finden Sie Ihre Bilder und Medien immer genau dann, wenn Sie diese brauchen. Geben Sie einfach einen Suchbegriff ein und schon erscheinen die passenden Dateien. Natürlich können Sie Ihren Medienkatalog auch nach Datum, GPS-Koordinaten, Größe, Ausrichtung und weiteren Merkmalen filtern. Möchten Sie die Dateien bearbeiten und verwalten, geht das Dank der Stapelverarbeitung in pixx.io einfach und effizient.

Kollektionen verkürzen den Workflow

Gerade für Bilder die oft zusammen verwendet, heruntergeladen oder geteilt werden, lohnt es sich Kollektionen anzulegen. Egal ob Sie Bilder für den kommenden Katalog sammeln, ein Portfolio haben welches Sie oft versenden, oder einfach für verschiedene Projekte Medien zusammenfassen möchten. Die Kollektionen in pixx.io bieten Ihnen alle Funktionalitäten, die Sie für einen schnellen und effizienten Arbeitsfluss brauchen.

Bilder teilen – Sicher und schnell

Mit pixx.io können Sie Ihre Bilder sicher und schnell teilen. Legen Sie einfach fest, in welcher Größe der Empfänger die Bilder erhält und wie oft beziehungsweise wie lange er Zugriff hat. Mit einem Klick können Sie außerdem ein Wasserzeichen in Ihre Dateien einfügen. Egal ob Sie fünf oder 500 Bilder teilen. Jedes Teilen von Dateien wird dabei mitprotokolliert. So behalten Sie den Überblick, wer, wann welche Dateien, in welchem Format erhalten hat.

Ihr Empfänger erhält dann per E-Mail einen Link und kann sich die mit ihm geteilte Kollektion ansehen und herunterladen. Egal ob am Laptop, auf dem Tablet oder auf dem Smartphone. Eine Installation ist nicht notwendig.

Hier sind Ihre Dateien sicher

Mit der pixx.io box haben Sie alle Ihre Dateien bei sich in Ihrem Büro, Wohnzimmer oder Fotostudio. Keine Daten landen auf weltweit verstreuten Servern und niemand Unbekanntes hat Zugriff auf Ihre Medien. Das Teilen von Dateien ist mit pixx.io einfach und schnell, es werden aber immer nur die von Ihnen bestimmten Mediendateien im vorher festgelegten Format nach außen gegeben. Die Originale bleiben immer unberührt auf der pixx.io box.

Die pixx.io box bietet aber gleichzeitig alle Vorteile einer Cloudlösung: Das heißt egal ob Sie ein Apple oder Microsoft Betriebssytem nutzen, egal ob Sie einen Laptop, ein Smartphone oder ein Tablet verwenden. Sie und nur Sie haben immer schnellen Zugriff auf Ihre Dateien. Ohne irgendetwas zusätzlich installieren zu müssen.


Was kann ich mit der pixx.io box tun?
Wie kann mir pixx.io helfen?

Dateien teilen und dabei die Kontrolle behalten

Mit der pixx.io box können Sie Ihre Dateien einfach und schnell mit Freunden, Kollegen und Kunden teilen. Gleichzeitig behalten Sie die volle Kontrolle, da Sie frei bestimmen können in welcher Größe und für welchen Zeitraum Ihre Daten freigegeben werden. Bilddateien können zusätzlich mit Wasserzeichen geschützt werden.

Immer die richtigen Dateien zur Hand

Mit der intuitiven Textfeldsuche, den zahlreichen Filtern (Größe, Orientierung, Erstelldatum, etc.) und der GPS-basierten Ortssuche haben Sie immer die richtigen Dateien zur Hand. Lästiges Klicken durch komplizierte Ordnerstrukturen entfällt mit pixx.io komplett.

Schützen Sie Ihre Bilder mit Wasserzeichen

Wenn Sie Bilder mit Anderen teilen, können Wasserzeichen ein wirksamer Schutz vor unerlaubter Verwendung sein. pixx.io fügt mit nur einem Klick, vorher frei definierbare Wasserzeichen in Ihre Dateien ein - egal ob Sie fünf oder 500 Fotos versenden.

Bilder schneller verarbeiten

Ein schneller 2 GHz Quad Core Prozessor sorgt dafür, dass auch große Dateien mit 50 MB und mehr, perfekt archiviert und schnell verarbeitet werden.

Arbeiten Sie effizienter

Die pixx.io Stapelverarbeitung ist die beste Möglichkeit Ihren Arbeitsprozess zu vereinfachen. Egal ob Sie Dateien bearbeiten, verschlagworten oder downloaden möchten, mit nur einem Klick können Sie alle ausgewählten Medien gleichzeitig verarbeiten.

Ihre Dateien sind sicher

Zwei permanent gespiegelte Festplatten stellen sicher, dass Ihre wichtigen Dateien bestens geschützt sind. Selbst im unwahrscheinlichen Fall eines Festplattendefekts, verlieren Sie nicht ein Byte Ihrer Daten.

Mit jedem Endgerät vollen Zugriff

Egal ob Tablet, Smartphone, Laptop oder Desktop PC. Auf die pixx.io box und Ihre Daten können Sie jederzeit mit allen Endgeräten im Netzwerk zugreifen.

Die Originaldateien bleiben unberührt

Egal, was Sie mit Ihren Dateien tun – die Größe ändern, sie teilen oder Wasserzeichen hinzufügen. Sie arbeiten in jedem Fall mit identischen Kopien Ihrer Daten. Die Originale bleiben zu jedem Zeitpunkt unberührt – außer Sie entscheiden sie zu löschen.


Was bekomme ich für mein Geld? 


Das pixx.io box Team

Christoph Trautbeck

ist Chefentwickler von pixx.io. Nach erfolgreichem Abschluss seines Informatikstudiums gründete er, im Alter von 24 Jahren, die Firma w-solution. Das Mutterunternehmen von pixx.io ist spezialisiert auf die Entwicklung von Web Anwendungen für mobile Endgeräte und Desktopcomputer. Christoph kann so auf über 13 Jahre Erfahrung in der Hard- und Softwareentwicklung zurückgreifen.

Richard Michel

ist Produktmanager von pixx.io und verantwortlich für die komplette Projektkoordination. Zudem beschäftigt er sich intensiv mit dem Hardwaredesign und –tests für die pixx.io box. Gemeinsam mit Christoph verfügt er über 13 Jahre Erfahrung als Geschäftsführer einer IT-Firma mit Fokus auf die Entwicklung von Web Anwendungen für mobile Endgeräte und Desktopcomputer.

Andreas Gölkel

ist passionierter Fotograf und selbst einer der aktivsten Nutzer der pixx.io Bilddatenbank. Seit seinem 16. Lebensjahr arbeitet er als freiberuflicher Journalist und archiviert seitdem alle seine Fotos. Bei pixx.io ist er verantwortlich für die Bereiche Marketing und Kommunikation. Das notwendige Wissen dazu hat er in verschiedenen Unternehmen und seinem Studium in Passau, Helsinki (Finnland), Salamanca (Spanien) und Nürnberg erworben.

Robert Schwarzenböck

ist mitverantwortlich für die Programmierung von pixx.io und der pixx.io box. Sein Spezialgebiet ist die Entwicklung von Web- und Smartphoneanwendungen. Bei pixx.io ist er außerdem für das Testen und die kontinuierliche Verbesserung der Software zuständig.

Claudia Trautbeck

kümmert sich bei pixx.io um die Finanzen. Alles was Buchhaltung und Steuern betrifft liegt in ihrem Hoheitsgebiet. Als fleißige Erstellerin von eigenen Fotobüchern ist Claudia außerdem die perfekte Beta-Testerin und bringt regelmäßig neue Ideen für die Weiterentwicklung von pixx.io und der pixx.io box ein
