story:
Thank you to all of you who have supported Tim during his two year journey since being diagnosed with Stage 4 prostate cancer and his treatment in Germany last year. With your support -  and Tim's own tenacity and perseverance - he has succeeded in keeping the disease from metastasizing, which his imaging continues to confirm as being stable. He's even been re-staged to Stage 3!

However, Tim is still on disability due to the extreme adverse effects of conventional hormone blockade, which in a non-medical scenario is known as 'chemical castration'. He knows that he's not out of the woods yet and has spent the past year carefully examining his treatment options. He continues to resist the fear that often accompanies a cancer diagnosis, while working closely with his naturopath -- as well as with his conventional doctors who unfortunately insist that external beam radiation is his 'only' choice.

On his Vancouver naturopath's advice, he's chosen an effective treatment that has been common in Germany and Austria for years but which is still under clinical trials in Canada and not yet available here in North America. He's been accepted for treatment in September at Dr. Ralf Kleef's Immunotherapy and Integrative Oncology Clinic in Vienna (http://dr-kleef.at/en/).

The treatment is called trans-urethral hyperthermia (TUH), which uses radio frequency waves to heat the prostate tumour from within, in combination with intravenous natural substances that his previous blood tests showed his cancer was sensitive to (ascorbic acid, artemisinin and curcumin). Unlike normal cells, cancer cells don't handle high temperatures well and they die under such extremes, especially when they're also bombarded with the cancer-fighting substances just mentioned. He'll undergo two weeks of treatment that includes TUH, external local deep hyperthermia, ozone therapy, and other treatments that kill cancer but don't damage healthy tissues the way radiation does.

Tim feels good about this decision and is looking forward to treatment. It's his fervent hope that he can return to work in October after his treatments.

Of course, none of the US$13,000 treatment cost is paid for by his provincial or employer health plans. And while we'll use savings to pay for some of the treatment costs and the US$5,000 in airfare and accommodation costs, I'm turning to you - Tim's family, friends and colleagues - for financial support to help defray the rest of his treatment expenses.

If you are moved and able to help, please know that contributions can be made in U.S. or Canadian dollars using either a credit card or a Paypal account.

We appreciate any contribution you can make - large or small - and if you can't offer financial support, we most certainly will appreciate your thoughts, prayers, visualizations and meditations on a cure for Tim during his upcoming treatments.

In appreciation for your support, Tim will email you a series of 15-minute MP3 audio meditations guided by Deepok Chopra (described under "Perks").

Every contributor, regardless of contribution level, will be invited to join Tim's online Tyze page where he'll share his progress and where you can share your thoughts and messages.

Thank you!

story:
Aesha Waks: The Model Body


INTRO

 “The Model Body” is a memoir written by Aesha Waks, an award winning actress best known for such independent films as Arresting Gena and Went to Coney Island on a Mission from God... Be Back by Five. Aesha’s passion for the arts and entertainment also goes as far as music, modeling, and recycled art. Conceived as a journal followed by a school paper for NYU, the book chronicles Aesha’s struggles with eating disorders and borderline anorexia in her youth. She would ultimately come to the realization that one must have full mental control before full physical control to improve not only well-being but also self-esteem.
“The Model Body" was edited by Aesha’s former fiance, Liam McMullan, as well as being the creative director. Liam worked closely with Aesha in completing this book. The other half of the book features pictures of inspirations of Aesha as well as photos that were taken by Liam and Patrick McMullan. All photos courtesy of PATRICKMCMULLAN.COM.

WHAT THE MONEY IS FOR

 Your contributions will help us put “The Model Body” into print as well as promotions, specifically a release party where Aesha will be in attendance to personally sign copies of the book.


ANY SMALL DONATION WOULD REALLY HELP. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE REWARDS WE OFFER ON THE RIGHT FOR DIFFERENT LEVELS OF CONTRIBUTION.THANK YOU!!!

For more information about Aesha and “The Model Body”, visit http://www.aeshawaks.com/

story:
Hi my name is Carrie and I have chronic Lyme disease-and I'm pissed off about it. Not at being sick per say-but the fact that I, like so many other people who suffer from this disease, have been denied adequate treatment.

Why I'm fundraising

I am about to start my third course of treatment for Lyme disease-yes you read that correctly. I have done 2 courses of treatment previously, and in my mind have been severely undertreated. I now have an appointment to see a specialist, or what we refer to in the Lyme community as a Lyme Literate MD and I'm overjoyed at the prospect of FINALLY getting proper treatment! There's one tiny problem however, and that is LLMD's aren't currently taking insurance. Why you ask? It's because these doctors have chosen to treat outside the current guidelines which state that Lyme disease has no chronic form and is easily treatable with a few weeks of antibiotics. Clearly in my experience-along with countless others-this is not the case. Luckily, there are compassionate doctors out there who've seen the light; unluckily, their recognition and treatment of chronic Lyme disease has cost them their relationship with health insurance companies. The result of this split is that it's expensive, and I mean really expensive, to see a LLMD-and this financial burden falls entirely on the patient-who is required to pay for treatment out of pocket.

I have done my research and made an appointment with a doctor I believe I can put full confidence in. However, my initial treatment bill will look as follows:

Cost of initial visit: $700

First visit lab tests: $1,200 give or take

Montly follow-up visits: $250

Meds & Supplements: Depend on diagnosis, etc, etc

I do have something called out of network benefits built into my insurance plan and thus can get partial reimbursements for my expenses. My hope is to raise enough money to get over the initial financial hurdle, begin treatment as soon as possible, then continue to recycle the money that I'm reimbursed and use it for further medical expenses. If you're doing the calculations and $2,500 seems a bit high, that's because when this course of treatment is all said and done, I'd like to donate whatever money is left over to a worthy Lyme disease organization. In short, any and all money donated to this campaign will go to Lyme disease.

The Impact

Unfortunately Lyme disease is growing at exponential rates-with the number of new cases reported getting higher each year. In my area of the US you can't even utter the words Lyme disease without hearing about how someone's cousin, neighbor, sister-in-law have it. This disease isn't going away-in fact it's growing and continuing to affect more people each year. 

It is crucial that the medical community change their stance on treatment practices and policies regarding Lyme disease. This disease is treatable if addressed early and aggressively enough. However, people continue to go misdiagnosed and/or as in my case, undertreated. I do think that eventually things will change and as more people are sick and finding it hard to get proper treatment that the infectious disease powers at be will have to listen. For them to listen however, we first have to make some noise!  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to contribute financially and even if you are-it would mean a lot to me if you took some time to check out the following links:

1. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JgR_Jfbhv8&...

This documentary Under Our Skin is super informative and eloquently explains the politics surrounding Lyme.

2. http://www.ldsg.org/index.php?id=71

This write-up by the Lyme Disease Support Group of Oklahoma explains in a nutshell the difference between IDSA and ILADS diagnosis and treatment guidelines.

3. http://www.lymediseaseassociation.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=category&layout=blog&id=1&Itemid=583

If you're a nerd and want to read more about the above-here's some official reports on controversy regarding current treatment guidelines.

 

Your donation-be it time or money-means the world to me! Thank you, I am eternally grateful!

story:
Pure Hearts International Gives To Filipino Poor Kids

(WARNING: the VIDEO above & the 213 slideshow PICs clicking HERE may make you CRY...)

Here is a video of the "behind the scenes" preparation of the food bags:

Perk 1: Per $100 We Ship 1-Month's Supply Of Our PURE FOY!

Perk 2: Per $1000 We Ship ONE CASE Supply Of Our PURE FOY!

Perk 3: Lots of other perks! Just look to the right--------------------->>>>>>>>

             

PURE FOY

Hi, my name is John Carson Lester Jr. Since the age of 19, by God's grace, I have been a committed disciple of Jesus Christ (here's my testimony). My mother is a PK (preacher's kid) and I am a PGK (preacher's grand kid). My Grandfather, the Reverend Earl Fultz, was a Pentecostal Preacher who pastored his own large church (the Rochester, Michigan "Church of God") for 40 plus years before he passed away at age 79 in 1990. 

3 years ago, in 2010, I met my wife Floremay Ordaniel (also pictured above) on Facebook! I then flew to the Philippines where I met her face to face and married her in 2011! And I am still here 3 years later building up, by God's grace, Pure Hearts International (which is a combination nutritional supplement company with an affiliate marketing income opportunity, non-denominational internet church and Filipino-oriented charity--a truly global social entrepreneurship organization if there ever was one)! And we have a young son named Abraham Rav Aluf Ordaniel Lester! 

If you'd ever like to look at our Lester Family Photo Album, I just started it up this month on Flicker. We already have over 10,000+ pics and 100+ videos and we're just getting that started. I believe you can learn a lot about people by looking at their family photo albums! Right now we have uploaded only the last two year's worth of pics here in only the Philippines because that was easy to get off of Floremay's iPhone. I have thousands and thousands more to add, not only from the Philippines, but from my whole life, saved and lurking about here and there on my hard drive. I'll get it all up there eventually. Floremay, as you can read about at the PHI link above, comes from a very poor Filipino family that never had many family pictures in the first place and what few they had were tragically destroyed a number of years ago in a fire. The only pics she has today of her younger life are pics she's been able to get from relatives.

Before I ever knew of Floremay's existence, as explained at this slide show and the bottom paragraphs of the home page at Pure Hearts International, Floremay has been a quiet unsung HERO leading the way here in the Philippines for years when it comes to feeding the Filipino poor! Therefore, it was a natural fit for my American nutritional supplement company, already with a spiritual mission to spread the gospel along with good health around the world, to add the mission of feeding the Filipino poor as well. So for almost 3 years now, PHI has been helping and feeding the Filipino poor in La Castellana and Bacolod City on Negros Occidental provincial island in the Philippines. Every $100 donation we receive, we ship a "token thank you gift" of 1-bottle (1-month's supply) of our outstanding all natural PURE FOY mineral and energy nutritional supplement! We have already shipped/supplied over 3,000 plus bottles of PURE FOY, by God's grace, and counting, in this charity mission, and raised over $300,000 plus dollars thus far, and counting, thanks to the generosity of our TOP DONORS! 

The Philippines, while poor, is a very, very important place in God's Kingdom. For example, the Philippines easily leads the Top 5 countries of Strong Faith and God believers:

1. Philippines - 94%

2. Chile - 79.4%

3. Israel - 65.5%

4. Poland - 62%

5. United States - 60.6%​

According to Price Waterhouse's publication Doing Business In The Philippines (1989), Indonesia, Papua New Guinea, Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Taiwan, Brunei, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, the Union of Myamar (formerly known as Burma), and most of Japan, Korea, and China surround the Philippine capital city of Manila within a short 2500-mile radius. In fact, almost one-third of the world's population lives within this 2500-mile geographic radius of Manila! Manila, which, in its own right, is the 8th largest city in the world with 19 million (19,000,000) residents, is also the only major city in the world that can boast that one-third of the world's population is within 2500 miles of its borders! Thus, as the third largest English speaking country in the world, and as the only majority-Christian Asian nation in the world (95% of the God believers in the Philippines are Christian, whereas 5% are Muslim), and as the # 1 Call Center country in the world, the Philippines is uniquely positioned to export American/Christian values to Asia (the fastest growing and most populous region on Planet Earth both today and tomorrow and for the rest of our lifetimes). As various modern Christian prophets have prophesied recently, it is imperative that we help and support their advancement because, in multiple ways, the Philippines is strategically located in the Kingdom of God on Earth! 

So I love the Filipino people with all of my heart because they are literally my family, my blood, and they are my brothers and sisters in Christ. And it absolutely breaks my heart every day when I see hungry Filipino children everywhere you look in this large island country. You can not even begin to imagine the amount of tears I have shed in the hospitals and on the streets of the Philippines here because of the sick and the poor everywhere! It's heart breaking to see them suffer like this! It's a human tragedy of epic proportions! Most Filipinos suffer every day whether there is a killer typhoon like Haiyan / Yolanda or not! You can never really even begin to understand how blessed we are as Americans until you have lived for a long time in a Third World country like the Philippines and discover how "the other half" of the world lives and suffers daily. 40% of the Filipino people live on $1.25 or less per day! Now I know and I will never, ever forget, by God's grace, as long as I shall live because now I see it every day with my own eyes... 

Your gift, no matter how small, or large, helps immensely, regardless of whether we meet our humble monthly $500 minimum goal or not. 70% of whatever you give goes directly to the Filipino poor, again, regardless of whether we meet our humble monthly $500 minimum goal or not. It doesn't matter whether we raise $100 or $100 million dollars, the percentage result is the same! For every $100 you give, that makes $70 available to buy rice to feed Filipinos always hungry in the poor rural areas of La Castellana (daily difficulties now compounded by Haiyan / Yolanda blowing the roofs off of their bamboo hut houses, with some entire bamboo houses now destroyed). Rice costs only about 30 pesos per kilo which is about 70 cents per kilo (2.2 lbs). Therefore, your $100 donation buys about 100 kilos or 220 lbs of rice, which feeds a Filipino family of four, for example, for many, many weeks! There has never been  a more important time for you to give than now because many of these families, already poor, have been practically wiped out because typhoon Haiyan / Yolanda has completely destroyed or at least deeply damaged the very rice and sugar cane fields that these poor Filipino families work on and subsist upon in their agricultural and rural way of life! 

If the Lord has mightily blessed you with abundance or you just feel to dig down deep to give to and help the needy Filipino people, for every $1000 you give, we will ship you an ENTIRE CASE (20 bottles or a 20-month supply) of our all natural PURE FOY herbal mineral and energy nutritional supplement! When that happens, we're confident that you'll add your voice to the growing chorus of life changing PURE FOY TESTIMONIALS! And you will have fed a Filipino family of four rice for WELL OVER A YEAR! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if the Lord does not yet have you in a position to help us feed the poor Filipino children at this present time thru a donation, you can still definitely help big-time in several different other ways that don't involve spending money, only time! One way is that you can become a Pure Hearts International 50% commissioned affiliate for FREE as explained at the FAQs of PureHeartsInternational.com and have 10% of every dollar you sell go to feeding the poor Filipino children! And to do that, as explained in great detail at the FAQs link above, all you have to do is to SHARE our amazingly technologically advanced (but easy to use) and highly transaction-able POPshops over SOCIAL MEDIA like Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest! Nothing could be easier, more rewarding and FUN! Or you can share us over social media using the share tools found near the top of the home pages of PureHeartsInternational.org and PureHeartsInternational.com! Or, you could become a volunteer! And finally, another way you can help, of course, is thru the use of the Indiegogo share tools found right here on this page! 

While you ponder and pray about exactly how to help, please enjoy our Theme Song! God bless you and yours and thank you so very much for helping Pure Hearts International and the Filipino poor children! May the Lord richly bless you and yours always and forever and ever! And we pray, Heavenly Father in Jesus' Name, that you click the CONTRIBUTE button right now! :)

(A) Hero (Lies in You)

(by Mariah Carey)


YOU CAN BE THEIR HERO! PLEASE FUND PHI TODAY! THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH! GOD BLESS YOU AND YOURS AND GOD KEEP YOU ALWAYS&FOREVER!!

There's a hero
If you look inside your heart
You don't have to be afraid
Of what you are
There's an answer
If you reach into your soul
And the sorrow that you know
Will melt away

[Chorus:]​

And then a hero comes along
With the strength to carry on
And you cast your fears aside
And you know you can survive
So when you feel like hope is gone
Look inside you and be strong
And you'll finally see the truth
That a hero lies in you

﻿It's a long road
When you face the world alone
No one reaches out a hand
For you to hold
You can find love
If you search within yourself
And the emptiness you felt
Will disappear

[Chorus]
​
The Lord knows
Dreams are hard to follow
But don't let anyone
Tear them away
Hold on
There will be tomorrow
In time
You'll find the way

[Chorus]

story:
Socrates Health Solutions, Inc. of Dallas, Texas has developed a working prototype of a noninvasive glucose monitor. As demonstrated in the video, CEO Scott Smith explains that his company, comprised of a team of scientists, engineers, physicians and healthcare professionals, has developed a new way to determine glucose levels in the bloodstream - without the painful and costly "prick" method available today. By simply attaching a sensor to the ear, the user can get an accurate blood glucose reading in seconds. There are over 371 million diabetics worldwide. 2 million people are added to the existing 26 million diabetics in the United States every year. Socrates is asking for your help to literally Change the World for diabetics everywhere.

For over 20 years, companies around the world have tried to produce a working prototype of the elusive Holy Grail of medical devices...the noninvasive glucose monitor.  Many have tried, but to date the results have been mixed at best.  The patent pending method behind the CompanionTM device differs from all those that have tried this before, allowing for a much more affordable and reliable device.

Though CompanionTM is a working prototype today, it is NOT FOR SALE and will not be available to the general public until it passes FDA approval.  That is why we need your help.  The funds received from this project will go to support the FDA process, clinical trials, legal expenses and operational requirements needed to pass FDA approval.

We appreciate your support and are excited about you joining us in Changing the World for DIABETICS. 

Visit us on the web at www.socrateshealthsolutions.com

Evolution...

Risks and challenges

Every newly developed electronic device has challenges. Currently, Companion is in its 4th generation of development. Internally, we call this - Companion Thing 4. Thing 4 is in the picture above and is what Scott Smith demonstrates in the video. Yes, Scott is able to test his blood sugar without pricking his finger - accurately and painlessly.

Now that we have a working prototype, our next challenge is FDA approval. Socrates is committed to producing a safe, effective, accurate and pain-free solution for diabetics who must check their blood glucose levels several times a day. Getting FDA approval is the top priority for Companion.

Clearly, not receiving FDA approval is a risk. That is why Socrates has several consultants and advisors to guide us every step of the way through this process. We are confident that this funding will allow us to make a significant step toward receiving FDA approval and bringing what will be a life-changing product to the market for diabetics...not only in the United States, but around the world.

TIMELINE

10/16/12 - Provisional patent for sensor submitted
06/19/13 - First iteration of working Prototype – Thing 1
08/02/13 - Non provisional patent submitted
08/15/13 - Next iteration of a working Prototype – Thing 4
10/28/13 - Next iteration of working Prototype – Thing 5
11/01/13 - Testing of Thing 5 against established test protocol
11/30/13 - Begin FDA pre-submittal process
12/16/13 - Begin shipping rewards!
02/01/14 - File 510K application to the FDA for Socrates CompanionTM
04/01/14 - Following FDA guidelines, begin further definition of manufacturing processes researching different materials and ensuring the process fully supports FDA Validation
04/01/14 - Begin Product Field Testing
10/01/14 - Submit FDA Application
06/15/15 - Target goal of having Socrates CompanionTM FDA approved, manufactured and ready to sell.

everywhere.

For over 20 years, companies around the world have tried to
produce a working prototype of the elusive Holy
Grail of medical devices...the noninvasive glucose monitor.  Many have tried, but to date the results have
been mixed at best.  The patent pending
method behind the CompanionTM device differs from all those that
have tried this before, allowing for a much more affordable and reliable
device.
Though CompanionTM is a working prototype today,
it is NOT FOR SALE and will not be available to the general public until it
passes FDA approval.  That is why we need
your help.  The funds received from this
project will go to support the FDA process, clinical trials, legal expenses and
operational requirements needed to pass FDA approval.
We appreciate your support and are excited about you joining
us in Changing the World for DIABETICS.  
Visit us on the web at www.socrateshealthsolutions.com

Evolution...







Risks and challenges
Every newly developed electronic
device has challenges. Currently, Companion is in its 4th generation of
development. Internally, we call this - Companion Thing 4. Thing 4 is in the
picture above and is what Scott Smith demonstrates in the video. Yes, Scott is
able to test his blood sugar without pricking his finger - accurately and
painlessly.
Now that we have a working
prototype, our next challenge is FDA approval. Socrates is committed to
producing a safe, effective, accurate and pain-free solution for diabetics who
must check their blood glucose levels several times a day. Getting FDA approval
is the top priority for Companion.
Clearly, not receiving FDA
approval is a risk. That is why Socrates has several consultants and advisors
to guide us every step of the way through this process. We are confident that
this funding will allow us to make a significant step toward receiving FDA
approval and bringing what will be a life-changing product to the market for
diabetics...not only in the United States, but around the world.
TIMELINE
10/16/12 - Provisional patent
for sensor submitted
06/19/13 - First iteration of working Prototype – Thing 1
08/02/13 - Non provisional patent submitted
08/15/13 - Next iteration of a working Prototype – Thing 4
10/28/13 - Next iteration of working Prototype – Thing 5
11/01/13 - Testing of Thing 5 against established test protocol
11/30/13 - Begin FDA pre-submittal process
12/16/13 - Begin shipping rewards!
02/01/14 - File 510K application to the FDA for Socrates CompanionTM
04/01/14 - Following FDA guidelines, begin further definition of manufacturing
processes researching different materials and ensuring the process fully
supports FDA Validation
04/01/14 - Begin Product Field Testing
10/01/14 - Submit FDA Application 
06/15/15 - Target goal of having Socrates CompanionTM FDA approved,
manufactured and ready to sell.

story:
Lad os stå sammen. Politik skal være mere end det er nu.
Vi kan gøre en konkret forskel. Men kun sammen.
Til højre kan i se hvad jeres bidrag udløser til gengæld.

Politik kan være mere end spin, gentagne sætninger og budgetforhandlinger.
Det skal være os, borgerne, som sammen råber højt, ærligt og hjerteligt for at gøre en reel forskel for andre mennesker og den verden der skal holde til vores børn og børnebørn.
Jeg vil have mennesket og miljøet i centrum, og jeg vil kunne være hudløs ærlig - også i mere end 30 sekunder. Jeg brænder af hele hjertet for at hjælpe andre mennesker, for at få gang i den bæredygtige omstilling og for at støtte de kulturelle vækstlag. Men jeg står alene, uden for parti, og jeg har ikke en krone på lommen. 

Så jeg håber i vil stå sammen med mig, og så er jeg overbevist om at vi kan gøre det sammen! Men det kan kun lade sig gøre hvis vi er fælles om det. Det er måske mit navn der står på plakaterne, men pladsen i byrådet er vores, ikke min.


Hvorfor jeg har brug for jeres hjælp igennem crowdfunding

 

  • Jeg har brug for alle de midler jeg kan skaffe. Jeg har sat et mål, men håber selvfølgelig på mere.
  • Pengene skal bruges til at gøre kampagnen synlig, til at tale den sag der handler om de udsatte, om miljøet og om kulturen.
  • ALT materiale bliver trykt 100% bæredygtigt på stenpapir og FSC.

Hvem er jeg? og hvad hvis det lykkes?

  • Du kan læse en masse om mig på steffenrasmussen.dk
  • Men lang historie kort, så har jeg lavet en masse, masse kulturelt og socialt arbejde. Fra at holde juleaften for dem som måske ikke har et andet sted at være, til at samle penge ind til at hjælpe mennesker og ægtepar der har været ramt af den stramme udlændingepolitk til at sende angstramte på familieophold. Jeg tror på gode gerninger, hjælpende hænder og hårdt arbejde.
  • Jeg bruger alt min overskydende tid på at sætte mig ind i emner, situationer og steder. Jeg besøger, snakker, spørger og oplever således at jeg kan gøre en reel forskel. Hvis jeg får nok stemmer til at komme i byrådet, så kan jeg love for at det kommer til at gøre en forskel.

Giv mig chancen. Jeg tør, jeg vil, jeg kan. Men ikke alene.
Vi kan hjælpe mennesker og være med til at skabe nye dage og nye tider for mennesker og miljø. Jeg beklager at bede om noget så direkte, men jeg er nødt til det. Kontakt mig endelig for spørgsmål, ris eller ros. 

 

www.steffenrasmussen.dk
steffen@steffenrasmussen.dk

story:
My name is David Parke, I am a 47 year old incomplete quadriplegic, father of two daughters, film technician and student. 

I am embarking on a bicycle ride fundraiser from Whitehorse, Yukon to Vancouver BC for Spinal Cord Injury BC. The 3,800 km journey will take approximately 41 days starting June 2, 2014. 

The money raised will go to assist spinal injured people of BC to attain adaptive equipment, housing, recreational options, re-education, mentoring and a lot more.  

The funds will go directly to SCIBC to help spinal disabled persons and that needs are met for a growing demand. I understand this need all too well. They are an amazing organization that provides a voice/support for  spinal injured people. Help me fundraise for SCIBC and many people will benefit as a result.

story:
Why We Launched This Campaign 

The Patriot Project (and its 800+ participating Chiropractors) are teaming with Magneceutical Health (and its game changing therapeutic technology) to bring much needed HEALING to our Veterans (and their battlefield stresses, strains, and pains), without the use of Drugs, Shots, or Surgeries.

The numbers are staggering and the Veterans Administration cannot meet their needs: 

  • 2.3 million Veterans served in Iraq and Afghanistan wars and @ 20% suffer PTSD (post traumatic stress disorder) and/or Depression   
  • 260,000 diagnosed with TBI (Traumatic Brain Injury)   
  • 22 Veterans die by Suicide everyday (2-3 times the National Avg)

But we have another Solution for our Wounded Heroes and they need your Help to get it into their HOME:

A natural energy based therapeutic treatment deployed through the skilled hands of the Chiropractors at the Patriot Project… the Magnesphere HALO ™.  Our Device will provide a “relaxation response” that helps in addressing any number of symptoms commonly associated with the Stress of the Battlefield… Pain, Stiffness, Energy Level,  and Poor Sleep.

So we’ve got the Ultimate Crowdfunding Project… “A Great Cause that uses the Latest Technology”


If you could see Magnetic Fields.... this is what they would look like with our System.


HOW DOES IT WORK ?

Similar to an MRI device, our technology is based on the principle that different types of tissue in the body will respond to different strength magnetic fields (ie nerve tissue responds to a different magnetic field than muscle, or bone). Our system, with the assistance of a healthcare professional, will immerse a patient into a specific, biologic magnetic field found to effect the tissues associated with their problem and create a "relaxation response". The Relaxation Response and its ability to address any number of the symptoms associated with chronic stress is not only well understood, it is also an important modality in the battle to attain and then retain a healthy state for patients. Dr. Jacobson, as well as independent principle investigators from Universities such as Cornell, Fairleigh Dickinson, and the University of Oklahoma, have studied magnetic fields for over 25 years and had amazing results that identify specific biologic effects of our very precise, physiologic electromagnetic fields. 

For more information about how our technology works, please check out the video below.


WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET
Our Wounded Heroes have plenty of Scars…. But little Money!
Your Contributions will help get HALO devices into the HOMES of our Heroes at NO COST to them.
Additionally, we’ve got some very cool perks (rewards) for YOU, like: 

  • A "Karma Credit" because you feel good when you do good.  And if everyone who came to this page gave $5 this campaign would be over today ... and the healing could begin tomorrow!

  • A lifetime place on our "Wall of Fame"

  • Commemorative Patriot Project  T-shirts & Collector Coins

  • Magazine subscriptions that go to our Active Duty Service members (we can't just help those that are Veterans and forget about the ones still on the front lines).

  • And for those willing to "dig a little deeper" and come out of pocket for $1,000 or more, we've put together some rewards that allow YOU to try the HALO in your OWN HOME (see below for more detail).


Basically, we need $4,000 to get a Halo into the Home of a Veteran. So with this $20,000 campaign, (after paying for direct costs like Indiegogo charges, credit card fees, and reward costs) we should be able to place 4 Halos with our Heroes.

IF we don’t meet the goal…. We will still send Halos to our Heroes with the money we do collect ! So its definitely not an “all or nothing” raise, but we hope to help as many as we can (and that’s driven primarily by YOU)

But we aren't worried about missing our Goal... we want to BEAT IT and hit a Stretch Goal of $30,000 (or more) as this will allow us to place at least 2 more Halos with our Vets.




THE IMPACT

“Help a Veteran”…. For almost every person in our country that is Easy to Say, Easy to Agree with … BUT NOT VERY EASY TO DO!

We can’t make a big difference on  the “how, what, and when” the VA gets its act together to properly care for these men and women.

But we have a cutting edge technology that, when combined with the skill and commitment of the Chiropractors at the Patriot Project, can make a huge impact on a veteran’s life in ONE DAY. All without Drugs, Shots, or Surgery !

The biggest Casualty of our Wars, is to be Forgotten. 

Please provide your Donation and let them know that you didn’t forget.


WHAT ARE THE RISKS AND CHALLENGES?

Almost none exist for this Project , as we already have lined up:

A. Wounded Veterans that need Help.

B. Chiropractors at the Patriot Project ready, willing and able to help.

C. Halo Devices being manufactured and sold today (ie these are not “prototypes”, they are ready for prime time).

The only thing that is lacking is money for the Veterans to be able to afford a Halo in their Home…. That’s where your contribution becomes the key to solving the Problem.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP?

Whether you contribute or not, if you got all the way to the end of this page then you’ve shown enough interest to at least reach out to family and friends  via email, facebook, twitter, etc and help us spread the word. (note if you don’t have any of that stuff you can use the Indiegogo share tools below.. its really just that easy)

We appreciate your assist and thank you for the time spent.

God Bless our Country… and those that keep and protect it.



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

How much do these HALO devices cost ?

$2,800 plus a monthly subscription of $100/mth to access your specific treatment  protocols via the internet. 

Is this Contribution Tax Deductible ? 

No, we are not a 501(c)(3)  designated Charity.

Does the VA pay for these devices for the Veterans ? 

No, many energy based modalities in the Complementary and Alternative Medicine arena are not reimbursed by the VA, Medicare, or Medicaid. BUT the VA is currently exploring the benefits of Alternative therapies helping Vets, so there is hope for the future that we may be reimbursable. (But we need your assist in Helping Vets TODAY... not next Year)

How often can the Veteran use this system ? 

Every day of the month for 1 ½ hrs each day.

If I donate $1,000 how much of the money goes to providing a Veteran a Halo device ?  

After the cost of  the 30 day lease for your personal Halo device @ $700 will remain to go towards Halos for our Heroes. Of course if you’d like to forego your Reward, we will use all of your donation in getting a Veteran a Halo.

If I donate $6,000 how much of the money goes to providing a Veteran a Halo device ? 

After the cost of  the 1yr lease for your personal Halo device @ $4,000 will remain to go towards Halos for our Heroes. Of course if you’d like to forego your Reward, we will use all of your donation in getting a Veteran a Halo.

If I donate $10,000 how much of the money goes to getting a Veteran a Halo device ? 

After the cost of  the 3yr lease for your personal Halo device @ $6,000 will remain to go towards Halos for our Heroes. Of course if you’d like to forego your Reward, we will use all of your donation in getting a Veteran a Halo.

If I donate $15,000 how much of the money goes to getting a Veteran a Halo device ? 

After the cost of  the purchase for your personal Halo device @ $8,000 will remain to go towards Halos for our Heroes. Of course if you’d like to forego your Reward, we will use all of your donation in getting a Veteran a Halo.

What kind of conditions can be treated by the HALO ?

The HALO is designed to enhance feelings of relaxation, and this allows us to address symptoms associated with "chronic stress" which is known to play a key role in many different disease states or conditions. Accordingly, there are a number of studies that support many different aspects of "health improvement" when stress is reduced.  Anecdotally, many people have reported improvement with a wide variety of health conditions.

The Magnesphere Halo™ is intended to enhance feelings of relaxation, and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Is this technology safe?

As a Class 1 device we are considered the lowest risk category.  The Magnesphere™ is classified under the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulation 21 CFR 890.5660. Under this product regulation the Magnesphere™ device is classified as a Class I medical device, exempt from 510(k) Premarket Submission. The FDA Product Code for the Magnesphere™ is ISA by the Physical Medicine Review Panel.

story:
Watch this video to learn more about our "Meditative Bodybuilding" concept:

 

-----FRANÇAIS----

Quand la musculation rime avec la vie. 
Entraînez-vous partout, quand vous voulez, avec vos outils préférés. Gérez au mieux votre temps. Choisissez entre plusieurs fréquences et durées d'entraînement possibles, de 25 minutes par jour à 1h30 tous les 5 jours.  Prenez du plaisir à vous entraîner. Profitez de la vie. 

 

Train Anywhere. Whenever. With whatever tool you want.
Manage your Time like you want and choose: 
Express Trainings (-25 min/day)
or  "Full Body" 1h30 Trainings only twice a week
Enjoy Training.
Enjoy Life.

 

 

-----FRANÇAIS----

Prenez votre destin en main grâce à une musculation qui s’intègre avec élégance à votre vie et devient une source de plaisir, d’équilibre et de progrès !
Sybernetics est une méthode innovante pour le pratiquant intelligent.
Votre transformation physique est un labyrinthe. Vous devez faire les bons choix : 

  • Quel exercice ? Quel outil ? À quel moment ? Quelle stratégie de progression ?
  • Que manger ? Comment adapter son alimentation à ses objectifs ?
  • Comment s’adapter aux aléas de la vie ? À un travail exigeant ? Une vie de famille ?
  • Comment prévenir et gérer les blessures ? Le Stress ?
  • Comment augmenter sa motivation au fil du temps ?
  • ... et plus encore !

Sybernetics est un parcours fléché, qui vous guide dans ce labyrinthe afin d’atteindre vos objectifs, en empruntant le chemin le plus rapide, le plus efficient.
Rien n’est laissé au hasard dans une méthode complète, souple et qui s’adapte à votre vie, à vos contraintes, à vos goûts. Motivation, nutrition, psychologie, gestion du stress, entraînement, santé : tous les sujets sont couverts et reliés entre eux d’une façon cohérente et absolument inédite dans le monde du sport.
« Jamais perdu » grâce l’expertise unique au monde de la Méthode Lafay, « toujours soutenu » grâce à sa communauté de plus d’un million de pratiquants.
Avec Sybernetics, un nouveau monde s’ouvre à vous, embarquez dans l’aventure !

 



Take control with a bodybuilding that fits elegantly into your life and becomes a source of pleasure, balance and progress!

Your physical transformation is a maze. You have to make the right choices: 

  • Which exercise? Which tool? At which moment? Which progression strategy?
  • What to eat? How to adapt your diet to your goals?
  • How to adapt to life's hazards? To a demanding job? A family life?
  • How to prevent and manage injuries? Stress?
  • How to increase motivation over time?
  • ... and even more! 

Sybernetics is a signposted route, that guides you through this maze, to achieve your goals by taking the fastest, most efficient path.


 

Nothing is left to chance in a complete, flexible method that adapts to your life, your constraints, your tastes. Motivation, nutrition, psychology, stress management, training, health: all subjects are covered and linked together in a coherent and absolutely unprecedented way in the world of sport.

"Never Lost" thanks to the unique expertise of the Lafay’s Method, "always supported" thanks to its community of over a million users.

With Sybernetics, a new world opens up to you, embark on the adventure!



 



​100% des athlètes présentés sur cette page ont construits leur physique grâce à la Méthode Lafay, dont Sybernetics est la consécration.

La  méthode Universelle. 
La méthode est un chemin en constante évolution. Comme votre vie. Sybernetics vous donne des techniques et routines d'entraînement précises qui s'adaptent à toute vos contraintes. Pour que rien ne se mette plus en travers de votre progression : 

  • Prise de muscles
  • Perte de graisses
  • Amélioration de vos performances athlétiques (endurance, puissance, force, souplesse...)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The method is a constantly evolving path. Just like your life.
Sybernetics gives precise techniques and routines to adapt to every situation.
So nothing can stop you on your road to progress: 

  • Muscle gain
  • Fat loss
  • Improvement of your athletic performance

 

 

Sybernetics est un changement de paradigme pour le monde du sport. 
"Sport = Santé" est malheureusement une équation fausse la plupart du temps. La majorité des sports aujourd'hui (incluant la musculation) promeuvent des valeurs comme le dépassement de ses limites (jusqu'à épuisement), la compétition (davantage que la coopération), et l'acceptation de la douleur (là où nous promouvons la reconnexion à soi). 


     

    Quand musculation rime avec libération. 
    Sybernetics est une méthode universelle. Donc vous avez le choix dès le début du livre de vous entraîner avec les outils traditionnels des salles de musculation (haltères, kettlebells, élastiques, barres, machines...) ou bien de vous entraîner au poids-du-corps pour pouvoir vous entraîner chez vous ou en déplacement.

     

    Sybernetics is a universal method.
    You can choose to apply our strategies with dumbbells, kettlebells, straps, and weighted bars, or go for bodyweight exercises to train literally anywhere (at home, at the gym, in vacation…)



    "Sport = Health".
    Sadly, this equation is FALSE most of the time.  
    Most sports today (including bodybuilding) are about : always pushing your limits (until exhaustion) , competition (rather than cooperation) and acceptation of pain (rather than improving self-control and sensibility). 
    It's said that "No Pain No Gain", or "Go Hard or Go Home"... 
    Injuries and doping are a logical corollary of this ideology. 

    It was about time to pour a great glass of serious science on this mythology. 

     


     

    En musculation traditionnelle, atteindre des hautes performances demande beaucoup de temps, d'énergie et de volonté. Avec Sybernetics, il ne sera plus nécéssaire de vous forcer pour aller à la salle. Notre approche stratégique est fondée sur la recherche de l'Efficience : plus de résultats pour moins d'énergie et moins de temps. 


    In traditional Bodybuilding, achieving high performance is time-and-energy consuming and requires tons of willpower.
    With Sybernetics, brutalising yourself to go to the gym will be a thing of the past.

    A strategic approach implies seeking Efficiency.

    • Effort Efficiency: more results for less energy.
    • Time Efficiency: more results for less time spent training-out​

     




    3500 études, références et le savoir faire acquis en 15 ans d'expertise condensés en 500 pages de savoirs pratiques. Tout ce que vous devez savoir sur la musculation, les performances athlétiques, la motivation, la nutrition et bien plus encore. Ne soyez pas effrayés par le volume de cette bible, vous serez guidés dès la première page grâce à un système de navigation innovant. 

     

    3500 studies and references, the know-how of 15 years of expertise  condensed into
    500 pages of synthetic and actionnable knowledge.
    A unique vision thanks to the sciences of systems called cybernetics. 
    Everything you'll ever need to know about bodybuilding, athletic performances, motivation, nutrition, and much more.
    Don't be afraid by the size of this bible, you will be guided from the first page thanks to an innovative navigation system.

    À propos du projet : échéances, risques et défis.

    Après 15 ans de développement dont 3 ans de rédaction, notre équipe d'experts sous la direction d'Olivier Lafay ont terminé le manuscrit. Notre talentueux graphiste-dessinateur a terminé le travail artistique sur le livre. Le plus dur a donc été fait ! 
    Maintenant, nous avons besoin de l'aide de la communauté d'Indiegogo afin de lever les fonds nécessaires à l'aboutissement de notre projet éditorial : 

    • Embaucher un(e) maquettiste professionnel(le) de talent afin que notre livre de 500 pages soit très confortable à lire, que ce soit pour la version papier et la version ebook. 
    • Embaucher un traducteur professionnel.
    • Imprimer, stocker et envoyer les premiers exemplaires dans le monde entier.

    Nous prévoyons une livraison des livres chez vous début Décembre, de sorte que vous puissiez l'offrir à vos proches pour Noël et à vous-même pour tenir vos bonnes résolutions de début 2019 !
    La version Ebook quant à elle devrait vous être envoyée avant cela, potentiellement dès début Novembre 2018. Nous vous conseillons d'ailleurs d'obtenir les 2 versions (papier + ebook) pour pouvoir l'amener facilement avec vous partout (à la salle ou en vacances notamment).
     

    Edgar Morin est une référence intellectuelle qui a massivement influencé nos travaux. Nous avons une profonde reconnaissance pour son immense travail. Le titre de notre livre est un hommage à son concept de "Sybernétique" décrit dans sa Méthode. Merci Edgar. 


    Edgar Morin is one of the major intellectual influence of Sybernetics. We are so deeply grateful for his immense work. The name of our book is a tribute to his concept of "Sybernetic", described in his Method. Thank You Edgar.

     

    EXTENDED GOALS 

    100% : Collector Edition released.
     



    500 leather covered books limited edition. Numbered. Signed. 



    About our project: deadlines, risk and challenges.


    After 15 years of development and 3 years of intensive writing, our team of 5 experts led by Olivier Lafay have finished the manuscript. Our talented graphic artist just finished the artwork. So the hardest has already been done! 
    Now, we need the help of the Indiegogo community to raise funds in order to complete the self-editing process: 

    • Hire a professional super talented Lay-out artist to make sure our 500 pages are super confortable to read both for the hard-cover and the ebook version.
    • Hire a professional english translator.
    • Print, stock and send the first batch of books worldwide.
       


    We plan for an early December worldwide delivery for the hard-cover, so you will be able to offer this book as a Christmas gift to your loved ones and to yourself to eventually respect your 2019 New Year's resolutions! 
    The E-book should be sent even before that, and you should be able to start your Sybernetics training as early as November 2018. Anyway, we advise you to claim for both the hard-cover and digital version to bring it everywhere with you (at the gym or in vacation for example).

Watch this video to learn more about our "Meditative Bodybuilding" concept:


 
-----FRANÇAIS----
Quand la musculation rime avec la vie. Entraînez-vous partout, quand vous voulez, avec vos outils préférés. Gérez au mieux votre temps. Choisissez entre plusieurs fréquences et durées d'entraînement possibles, de 25 minutes par jour à 1h30 tous les 5 jours.  Prenez du plaisir à vous entraîner. Profitez de la vie. 
 
Train Anywhere. Whenever. With whatever tool you want.Manage your Time like you want and choose: Express Trainings (-25 min/day)or  "Full Body" 1h30 Trainings only twice a weekEnjoy Training.Enjoy Life.
 
 
-----FRANÇAIS----
Prenez votre destin en main grâce à une musculation qui s’intègre avec élégance à votre vie et devient une source de plaisir, d’équilibre et de progrès !Sybernetics est une méthode innovante pour le pratiquant intelligent.Votre transformation physique est un labyrinthe. Vous devez faire les bons choix : 

Quel exercice ? Quel outil ? À quel moment ? Quelle stratégie de progression ?
Que manger ? Comment adapter son alimentation à ses objectifs ?
Comment s’adapter aux aléas de la vie ? À un travail exigeant ? Une vie de famille ?
Comment prévenir et gérer les blessures ? Le Stress ?
Comment augmenter sa motivation au fil du temps ?
... et plus encore !

Sybernetics est un parcours fléché, qui vous guide dans ce labyrinthe afin d’atteindre vos objectifs, en empruntant le chemin le plus rapide, le plus efficient.Rien n’est laissé au hasard dans une méthode complète, souple et qui s’adapte à votre vie, à vos contraintes, à vos goûts. Motivation, nutrition, psychologie, gestion du stress, entraînement, santé : tous les sujets sont couverts et reliés entre eux d’une façon cohérente et absolument inédite dans le monde du sport.« Jamais perdu » grâce l’expertise unique au monde de la Méthode Lafay, « toujours soutenu » grâce à sa communauté de plus d’un million de pratiquants.Avec Sybernetics, un nouveau monde s’ouvre à vous, embarquez dans l’aventure !

story:
We provide a simple solution for supermarkets to reduce their perishable food loss & deliver the consumer those savings via mobile.

Our Mission: EcoBasket’s mission is to reduce the amount of perishable food wasted every day by Supermarkets through easy-to-use smartphone coupons that save you money. It’s simple: they waste less, you save more.

The Problem: Food is the number one material sent to landfills in the U.S. On average, the U.S. wastes 40% of the food we produce.

Customers who shop in any of the enormous supermarkets expect only the freshest vegetables, fruits, meats, fish, and dairy. Supermarket managers have no choice but to throw out 39% of their inventory as a daily routine. If you run one of these supermarkets, waste is simply the cost of doing business. The USDA estimates that supermarkets lose $15 billion annually in unsold fruits and vegetables alone.

EcoBasket Overview: 

They waste less, you save more. 

• EcoBasket provides a simple way to redeem coupons for perishable goods, letting you save every time you shop for fresh fruits, vegetables, meats and dairy 

• EcoBasket enables stores to create coupons quickly based on their needs  

HOW DOES THIS WORK?

The customer's smartphone will identify the location and the customer will be able to see the coupons automatically as he/she enters the store

EcoBasket will serve both the consumer and retailers.

Consumer Benefits:

•Immediate savings on fresh food fruits, vegetables, meats, and dairy

•Eliminate the need for paper coupons and circulars

•Loyalty program to benefit the frequent shopper

•HUGE money savings weekly, monthly and yearly

Retailer Benefits:

•Ability to promote perishable goods overstock 

•Quicker reimbursement

•Ability to process coupons immediately 

•Access to back end database, bypassing coupon clearinghouses and avoiding unnecessary promotional delays.

•Reduces the amount of time necessary to know the effectiveness of a coupon campaign 

 The Rewards

Educate others on food waste with our rocking T's

Show the world a positive message on the back of the T's


Four Reasons You Should Back EcoBasket:

1. You have a passion to help Reduce Food Waste

2. Management Team - EcoBasket's management team can make this happen through proven leadership, experience and the passion to change the system (brief bios below) 

3. Our Technology – There is nothing like it. EcoBasket helps supermarkets waste less and consumers save more money, simply and easily.

4. The EcoBasket Platform – Can reach 90% of shoppers


We Need YOU!! With your help we can:

1.REDUCE PERISHABLE FOOD WASTE.

2.Convert our prototype from beta to implementation into some of the largest supermarkets in the world who we already have relationships with and are waiting eagerly to start using EcoBasket.

3.Fund the remainder of the back-end platform development which will release our marketing gurus to make sure you can use EcoBasket to save more wherever you buy groceries.

The more we raise, the more we can SAVE as a whole.

Who Are We? 

The EcoBasket team is comprised of a perfect mix of seasoned veterans from Fortune 100 companies and serial entrepreneurs all with the focus of changing the paradigm of food waste by retailers to benefit the consumer nationwide.

Vince A.Wasik - CEO – FOUNDER

•Co-Founder and Principal, MCG Global, LLC 

•The Hertz Corporation - Executive Vice President and Director responsible for the global Hertz car rental activities 

•Managing Director of Hertz Europe, in charge of all Hertz Corporate subsidiaries across Europe 

•National Car Rental System Inc. Chairman and CEO - appointed by Paine Webber following its $1.6 billion LBO 

•Holland America Line - President and CEO 

•Wesray Corp Vice President - Participated in the acquisition of Gibson Greeting Cards and RCA Mobile Communications

S. Garrett Stonehouse – COO

•Co-Founder and Principal, MCG Global, LLC

•Instrumental in the financial structuring, strategic planning, and the successful acquisition of a number of middle market companies purchased by MCG in the U.S. and Internationally

•Fidelco Capital Group – VP responsible for due diligence, industry research, financial modeling and transaction analysis for LBO transactions 

•GE Capital – Manager of Marketing and cross promotions 

•Currently serves as Director of Einstein Noah Restaurant Group(NYSE:BAGL) and three other privately held companies 

Walter Carozza – CTO

•Mr. Carozza has 20 years experience as a direct investor in and executive level manager of information technology companies.  

•His IT experience is broad - he has worked with companies in the fields of pure hardware, firmware solutions, IT services, data storage and analytics, software development and vending, web-based retail and commercial sites. 

•He has assumed operational roles with many of the companies he has helped finance, including Director, COO, CIO, CFO, and General Counsel.

•As such he has structured, invested in and managed private equity financing, IPOs, secondary offerings, reverse mergers, PIPEs, and other financing transactions for numerous technology companies.  

Terence J. Fitzpatrick – Co- Founder & VP of Business Development

•Founder & CEO of Golfmoolah, LLC - A golf/social media app on ITunes & endorsed by 5 of the top 25 PGA tour players in the world. 

•Founder & developer of Fringles – Created one of the first global social media/online dating sites with successful exit 

•TJF Enterprises, LLC President – Grew to a multi-million dollar firm via personal technical analysis equations 

•VP Clubsites International – Instrumental in building the first online reservation system for golf clubs via back-end data system 

•International HR Consultants Executive – Led strategic plans & financial operations globally 

Conley Downing – CMO

•Marketing professional with experience developing strategically sound programs and achieving outstanding results in a diverse set of categories including CPG, beverages, healthcare, financial card services and electronics 

•Championed trade marketing communication to national field sales teams for Pernod Ricard

• Developed new brand identity for J.P Morgan Chase Credit Card Managed implementation of global packaging strategy for Hewlett Packard 

•Contributed to development of award winning P-O-S for Novartis Consumer Health and Pernod Ricard  

FAQs 
Concern: Large companies will leverage ability to provide their own platform. 

Response: EcoBasket has first mover advantage and captive audience.

Concern: Consumer concerns of quality of goods. 

Response: Freshness guaranteed by stores expiration dates and safety regulations.

Concern: No defining Industry standard. 

Response: Flexibility of industry promotes innovation; a standard will soon be reached.

Concern: EcoBasket will face execution risks. 

Response: EcoBasket has a successful and experienced management team.
story_txt:
We provide a simple solution for supermarkets to reduce their perishable food loss & deliver the consumer those savings via mobile.


Our Mission: EcoBasket’s mission is to reduce the amount of perishable food wasted every day by Supermarkets through easy-to-use smartphone coupons that save you money. It’s simple: they waste less, you save more.
The Problem: Food is the number one material sent to landfills in the U.S. On average, the U.S. wastes 40% of the food we produce.
Customers who shop in any of the enormous supermarkets expect only the freshest vegetables, fruits, meats, fish, and dairy. Supermarket managers have no choice but to throw out 39% of their inventory as a daily routine. If you run one of these supermarkets, waste is simply the cost of doing business. The USDA estimates that supermarkets lose $15 billion annually in unsold fruits and vegetables alone.





EcoBasket Overview: 
They waste less, you save more. 
• EcoBasket provides a simple way to redeem coupons for perishable goods, letting you save every time you shop for fresh fruits, vegetables, meats and dairy 
• EcoBasket enables stores to create coupons quickly based on their needs  
HOW DOES THIS WORK?



The customer's smartphone will identify the location and the customer will be able to see the coupons automatically as he/she enters the store
EcoBasket will serve both the consumer and retailers.
Consumer Benefits:
•Immediate savings on fresh food fruits, vegetables, meats, and dairy
•Eliminate the need for paper coupons and circulars
•Loyalty program to benefit the frequent shopper
•HUGE money savings weekly, monthly and yearly
Retailer Benefits:
•Ability to promote perishable goods overstock 
•Quicker reimbursement
•Ability to process coupons immediately 
•Access to back end database, bypassing coupon clearinghouses and avoiding unnecessary promotional delays.
•Reduces the amount of time necessary to know the effectiveness of a coupon campaign 
 The Rewards



Educate others on food waste with our rocking T's

Show the world a positive message on the back of the T's


Four Reasons You Should Back EcoBasket:
1. You have a passion to help Reduce Food Waste
2. Management Team - EcoBasket's management team can make this happen through proven leadership, experience and the passion to change the system (brief bios below) 
3. Our Technology – There is nothing like it. EcoBasket helps supermarkets waste less and consumers save more money, simply and easily.
4. The EcoBasket Platform – Can reach 90% of shoppers

We Need YOU!! With your help we can:
1.REDUCE PERISHABLE FOOD WASTE.
2.Convert our prototype from beta to implementation into some of the largest supermarkets in the world who we already have relationships with and are waiting eagerly to start using EcoBasket.
3.Fund the remainder of the back-end platform development which will release our marketing gurus to make sure you can use EcoBasket to save more wherever you buy groceries.
The more we raise, the more we can SAVE as a whole.



Who Are We? 
The EcoBasket team is comprised of a perfect mix of seasoned veterans from Fortune 100 companies and serial entrepreneurs all with the focus of changing the paradigm of food waste by retailers to benefit the consumer nationwide.
Vince A.Wasik - CEO – FOUNDER
•Co-Founder and Principal, MCG Global, LLC 
•The Hertz Corporation - Executive Vice President and Director responsible for the global Hertz car rental activities 
•Managing Director of Hertz Europe, in charge of all Hertz Corporate subsidiaries across Europe 
•National Car Rental System Inc. Chairman and CEO - appointed by Paine Webber following its $1.6 billion LBO 
•Holland America Line - President and CEO 
•Wesray Corp Vice President - Participated in the acquisition of Gibson Greeting Cards and RCA Mobile Communications
S. Garrett Stonehouse – COO
•Co-Founder and Principal, MCG Global, LLC
•Instrumental in the financial structuring, strategic planning, and the successful acquisition of a number of middle market companies purchased by MCG in the U.S. and Internationally
•Fidelco Capital Group – VP responsible for due diligence, industry research, financial modeling and transaction analysis for LBO transactions 
•GE Capital – Manager of Marketing and cross promotions 
•Currently serves as Director of Einstein Noah Restaurant Group(NYSE:BAGL) and three other privately held companies 
Walter Carozza – CTO
•Mr. Carozza has 20 years experience as a direct investor in and executive level manager of information technology companies.  
•His IT experience is broad - he has worked with companies in the fields of pure hardware, firmware solutions, IT services, data storage and analytics, software development and vending, web-based retail and commercial sites. 
•He has assumed operational roles with many of the companies he has helped finance, including Director, COO, CIO, CFO, and General Counsel.
•As such he has structured, invested in and managed private equity financing, IPOs, secondary offerings, reverse mergers, PIPEs, and other financing transactions for numerous technology companies.  
Terence J. Fitzpatrick – Co- Founder & VP of Business Development
•Founder & CEO of Golfmoolah, LLC - A golf/social media app on ITunes & endorsed by 5 of the top 25 PGA tour players in the world. 
•Founder & developer of Fringles – Created one of the first global social media/online dating sites with successful exit 
•TJF Enterprises, LLC President – Grew to a multi-million dollar firm via personal technical analysis equations 
•VP Clubsites International – Instrumental in building the first online reservation system for golf clubs via back-end data system 
•International HR Consultants Executive – Led strategic plans & financial operations globally 
Conley Downing – CMO
•Marketing professional with experience developing strategically sound programs and achieving outstanding results in a diverse set of categories including CPG, beverages, healthcare, financial card services and electronics 
•Championed trade marketing communication to national field sales teams for Pernod Ricard
• Developed new brand identity for J.P Morgan Chase Credit Card Managed implementation of global packaging strategy for Hewlett Packard 
•Contributed to development of award winning P-O-S for Novartis Consumer Health and Pernod Ricard  
FAQs Concern: Large companies will leverage ability to provide their own platform. 
Response: EcoBasket has first mover advantage and captive audience.
Concern: Consumer concerns of quality of goods. 
Response: Freshness guaranteed by stores expiration dates and safety regulations.
Concern: No defining Industry standard. 
Response: Flexibility of industry promotes innovation; a standard will soon be reached.
Concern: EcoBasket will face execution risks. 
Response: EcoBasket has a successful and experienced management team.

story:
Healing Lupus through Yoga

I have been practicing yoga for over ten years, since I was first diagnosed with lupus.  Lupus is an autoimmune disease, which means my body creates antibodies against itself.  When I get sick or run down, those antibodies attack my healthy cells instead of the unhealthy virus.  Then, my organs and body systems stop functioning properly, because they are under assault.  Any small cold or flu lingers much longer than it should, and I live with the constant pain of inflamed muscles and tissues.  It is an awful, chronic condition.

Four things enable me to live an active and fulfilling life:

  1. Regular exercise (running, biking, swimming, or any other cardio exercise, 30 minutes at a time, 5-6 days a week)
  2. Yoga (simple and gentle postures helped get the blood circulating through my body, my joints a little more open and flexible, and my muscles stronger)
  3. Healthy eating (sugar, flour, and dairy have been replaced with whole, natural and organic foods, especially fruits and veggies)
  4. Psychological treatment to deal with the depression that follows such a diagnosis at only 28, and start focusing on how I can live well with this disease.

My goal is to be able to share these four keys to living with lupus with other patients living in DC, as well as other cities on the East Coast.  I am trying to raise $2,500 over the next six weeks to support a number of activities that will enable me to provide yoga instruction, health education, and emotional support to people living with lupus.

Estimates vary on the number of lupus sufferers in the United States ranges from approximately 300,000 to 1.5 million people. Most people with lupus are women. Anyone of any race can have the disease; however, African American women have triple the incidence (number of new cases) than White women.  There is currently no cure for the disease, and most of the approved medical treatments have serious side affects (blindness, diabetes, and hair loss, to name just a few).  A healthy lifestyle (including regular exercise, yoga, healthy eating, and psychological treatment) can help these women live well with lupus.

What We Need & What You Get

I need $2,500 to launch this project (plus the Indiegogo fees for a total of $2,750):

  • Get additional training in working with people dealing with arthritis and other medical conditions.  There are two workshops I want to attend (a medical yoga symposium in DC in January and a yoga for arthritis teacher training in New York in March).  I will need $1,500 to pay for the registration fees and travel costs to get additional training to work with people suffering from arthritis and other chronic health conditions.
  • Teach a free weekly yoga class for up to 20 people.  This requires me to secure a Metro-accessible space and purchase a few supplies (such as yoga mats, straps, and blocks) to help new students learn the basics.  Rent will probably be in the neighborhood of $50 a week at a church or other nonprofit organization.  I will need $1,000 to rent a space and purchase some basic supplies.

What’s in it for you?  The satisfaction of knowing you are doing good for people who really need it.

In addition, donors of

  • $25 will receive regular updates on my progress
  • $50 will have free admission to one yoga class that I teach in 2014-15
  • $100 will get props on my website and other printed materials
  • $500 will be able to play an ad on my website and blog

If I don’t reach the goal, I will use any funds raised to get the training, then buy the supplies, and finally pay to rent space for the classes.

The Impact

Your donor can improve the daily lives of hundreds and thousands of people living with lupus.  With the knowledge they will gain – along with the stronger minds and bodies they will develop through practicing yoga – they will be able to improve their health and extend their lives.  My doctors are amazed whenever I come in for my follow up appointments.  For most of the last five years, I have been able to avoid taking any of their toxic drugs while remaining healthy and hospital-free.  I know that exercise, yoga, eating, and therapy have made all the difference in my life, and I am confident it can help others.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please help me to get the word out about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the message on Facebook, Twitter, email, and the like!
  • Tell anyone you know with lupus to check out my website and learn more
  • Tell me about a suitable space in DC to use for the classes and workshops
  • Say a kind word or give a smile to anyone you know living with a chronic medical condition.  It’s tough.

As someone who lives with lupus, I know personally all the struggles that come along with this autoimmune disease. However, there is hope.  Thanks in advance for your support.

Crystal

story:
Message To My son 

I never knew how strong I can be until you came into my life. Watching you smile and always full of life gives me the strength.  You have given me so much to live for. Made me stronger than yesterday.  Its been a life experience I wouldn't trade in the world . I have felt , seen and been in places no man dares to go . Its an everyday challenge and fight but we are not breaking down . We've come so far together,  we will not back down , not now or ever. Whether we win or lose , we win! We gained so much more from this . You inspire me to do so much more. When I hold you in my arms and have your little body wrapped around me I don't ever feel like letting go , those little moments I cherish the most. You have taught me to stand strong and keep going . Mommy will always be there to hold your hand through this journey.  Best feeling in the world is being by your side through every awakening moment and to feel the warmth of your skin on mine, to hear your heartbeat and your laugh everyday. You are my sunshine even when the days seem dark you brighten them with every step of the way. I love to hear you say "mami" and the way you look at me with so much love in your eyes, no man can ever take that place . It will be alright,  we are in this together. The perfect team . Just hold my hand and mami will take care of the rest. I love you soo much-Mami 
A year ago my son jayden was diagnosed with a anaplastic ependymoma, a brain tumor. It was removed and treated with radiation. Durning this time we found it hard to meet our financial needs. I had to take time off work to care of my son. A year later he is diagnosed with a tumor in his spine. I will be off work for some time to care for my son. We are asking you to help us during this difficult time to help us be  financially  stable enough, to be able to focus our attention to his care and recovery.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Welcome friends and family.

This is a crowdsourced fundraising website setup to raise money to support my friend Sherise Brown.  

Sherise, mother of Daniel “De-Lo” Brown, lives in Peoplestown and works tirelessly in support of neighborhood middle school and high school students through a program called “Peoplestown Youth on the Move.”  (Who is Sherise and why is she the only S"aints" fan that I’m friends with? More on that in a second.)

  Sherise was living with undiagnosed diabetes and went into a coma last week. She is recovering at Grady, but is currently out of work. Because of her modest income, she is at risk of losing her house due to unpaid rent and bills. We can’t let this happen!  

Far too often, this kind of health situation will wreck a family - forcing them into debt, joblessness or worse. Not this time.

  My goal is to raise AT LEAST $1,500 today to cover the cost of rent for the next three months. My “stretch” goal is to raise $3,500 to help cover the cost of rent, utilities and food for the next three months, until Sherise can get on her feet.  

Good news: we are over 1/3 of the way there: I’ll kick in the first $500.  

Bad news: this isn’t a tax deductible gift. I’m sorry.  

Better news: Every penny will go immediately to Sherise in support of her recovery. 100% of the funds. No overhead. No waiting on a check to clear.  

Best news: If we raise $3,500 I will swim across the Etowah River in downtown Rome on Christmas Day as a way to say thank you (and because apparently every good fundraiser needs someone doing something ridiculous).  

If you don’t want to pay online you can send a check made out to Sherise Brown c/o Bryan Schroeder, 670 Boulevard SE, Atlanta, GA 30312.  

Check, cash and PayPal payments will go immediately to me and then immediately to Sherise. Credit card payments made through this donor website will be held and released on January 2nd. 

Heard enough? Ready to join the cause? Click "contribute now" to donate.

Enjoy having your heartstrings pulled? Read on and donate once you reach the bottom.

Backstory:  

During my early and mid 20’s, I had the great pleasure and good fortune to be an active volunteer / resident intern at Emmaus House in Peoplestown. Emmaus House changed my life and helped to make me the person I am today. Sherise’s son Daniel was one of our first Steppe Ahead backpackers and she always supported the program however she could (Daniel, by the way, would go on to be a starting linebacker for the University of Louisville football program and graduated college the year they beat Florida - something any UGA fan can admire).  

Sherise, like so many other people in the Peoplestown community, was an incredible influence on my life and helped to keep me on my feet during those days.  

Example 1:  Once a month, she would bring crawfish and/or low county boil to make sure I was staying well fed! Until then, I had never had crawfish or low country boil … you can say she had more than a small influence on my “culinary expertise.”

  Example 2 - somewhere my dad has a handwritten étouffée recipe Sherise wrote out after her son returned from a hiking trip and had promised us a copy of his favorite dish. That’s community building!  

Aside from keeping me happy, well fed and adjusted to life in the big city, Sherise worked for many many years supporting children in one of Atlanta’s most underserved and excluded communities. Computer training, conflict resolution, african dance, field trips, after-school support and athletics are just a few of the programs Peoplestown Youth On the Move offered the community.

  Recent history:  

Many of you attended Danielle’s 30th birthday party this May (check out the pics: https://www.facebook.com/bschro3000/media_set?s...).

Sherise was one of the hosts, helping to throw the best party I've ever attended.  

If you joined us and were wondering where all the beautiful, authentic New Orleans decorations and parasols came from, it was Sherise! If you were wondering who brought their family and absolutely turned the party upside down with NOLA style dancing, marching and singing, that was also Sherise!  

Sherise is the only Saints fan I know who doesn’t annoy me - this includes you Andre - and has been an incredible influence on my life.  

She has had my back for over a decade - it’s time I returned the favor.

  Last but not least:  

Have you been staring at your TV screen this week and wondering how you can make a difference in your community here at home?  

Here's your chance. Click "contribute now."

  PS: Thank you to Emmaus House for helping to create genuine and supportive community that helps to facilitate authentic relationships that cut across cultural and racial divides. If you aren’t an Emmaus House donor, I strongly encourage you to join me as an Emmaus House donor today! 

http://www.emmaushouseatlanta.org/donate/

PPS - below is says "Help raise fund for Sherise Brown and Bryan Schroeder" - I want to be clear that no funds will go to me! That's a formatting issues since I'm acting as a financial liaison.
